thisWeek.Title: R454B+42%
thisWeek.Summary: 중국발 R32 장기계약가가 +18.97%(CNY60,200/톤) 수준으로 뛴 흐름이고, 미국은 R454B에 +42% 서차지까지 붙었어요. 냉매는 ‘대체가 느린 규제 전환 품목’이라, 늦게 잡으면 조달 단가가 한 번에 튈 수 있어요. Impact(B): R454B +42% → (가정) 에어컨 BOM에서 냉매비중 2%면 제품원가 +0.84%; 환율 1달러=1,443.9원(2/13 IBK) 적용 시 북미 구매분 원화 예산도 재산정 필요. 삼성 관점: 광주·SEHC(베트남)은 R32 조달 안정성, 북미 라인은 R454B 수급/가격이 핵심 리스크예요. 액션: ① Q2~Q3 냉매 소요량 확정+선확보 발주(즉시) ② R32/R454B 공급사 2원화+실린더 리드타임 동시 점검(기한: 2026-02-18) ③ EU F-gas(2026 일부 품목 금지) 반영해 모델별 냉매 로드맵 재검증(기한: 2026-02-25) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-25). 참고: CoolingPost+2, EU공식+1
thisWeek.Summary_en:
The long-term R32 contract price from China has surged to +18.97% (CNY60,200/ton), while the US has added a +42% surcharge to R454B. Refrigerants are "slow-to-transition items," so delaying the transition can lead to a sudden surge in procurement costs.
Impact (B): R454B +42% → (Assumption) A 2% refrigerant share in the air conditioner BOM translates to a +0.84% ​​product cost; at the exchange rate of $1 = KRW1,443.9 (February 13, IBK), the KRW budget for North American purchases also needs to be recalculated.
Samsung's perspective: The key risks for Gwangju and SEHC (Vietnam) are the stability of R32 procurement, while the key risks for the North American line are the supply and demand/price of R454B. Actions: ① Confirm Q2-Q3 refrigerant requirements + pre-order (immediately) ② Dualize R32/R454B suppliers + Simultaneously review cylinder lead times (Deadline: 2026-02-18) ③ Re-verify refrigerant roadmaps by model, reflecting EU F-gas (some items banned in 2026) (Deadline: 2026-02-25) (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-25). Reference: CoolingPost+2, EU Official+1

thisWeek.Title: 냉매 R454B 규제
thisWeek.Summary: EU F-Gas 규제 강화로 R454B·R32 같은 저 GWP 냉매 수요가 늘면서 R454B 시장가격이 최근 몇 년간 +18~20% 가량 오른 구간이에요.minisplitsforless+1 미국·EU에서 R410A 신규 사용을 단계적으로 막고 있어 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨 냉매 비용이 앞으로도 구조적으로 높아질 가능성이 커요.linkedin+1 R454B가 R32 대비 파운드당 +20~25% 비싼 프리미엄을 유지하고 있어서, 광주·SEHC 에어컨에서 R454B 전환 비중이 커질수록 한 대당 냉매 BOM이 대략 +0.2~0.3%p 추가로 오를 수 있어요. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 7~9월 성수기 R454B/R32 소요량 6~9개월분 장기계약(상한 +10~15% 캡) 체결 ② R454B 전환 모델은 고효율·저 GWP 프리미엄을 판매 가격·마케팅 메시지에 반영해 원가 전가 ③ 중장기적으로 R32/R290 대체 설계 확대 및 냉매 충전량 절감 설계 R&D 협의(우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: EU공식+1, JohnsonControls+1, HVAC시장리포트+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: As the demand for low-GWP refrigerants such as R454B and R32 has increased due to the strengthening of EU F-Gas regulations, the market price of R454B has risen by about +18~20% in recent years. minisplitsforless+1 As the US and EU are gradually banning the use of new R410A, the cost of refrigerant for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioners is likely to continue to structurally increase. linkedin+1 R454B maintains a premium of +20~25% per pound compared to R32, so as the proportion of R454B conversion in Gwangju and SEHC air conditioners increases, the refrigerant BOM per unit may increase by approximately +0.2~0.3%p additionally. Action: ① Peak season from July to September for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE Long-term contracts for 6-9 months of R454B/R32 demand (upper limit + 10-15% cap) have been signed. 2) The R454B conversion model will reflect the high-efficiency, low-GWP premium in sales prices and marketing messages to pass on costs. 3) Discussions on R&D to expand the R32/R290 replacement design and reduce refrigerant charge volume in the mid- to long-term are underway (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-31). References: EU Official+1, JohnsonControls+1, HVAC Market Report+1
thisWeek.Tag_en: Refrigerant, R454B, R32, +20%, regulation, hedging

thisWeek.Title: 알루미늄 변동 확대
thisWeek.Summary: 알루미늄은 최근 LME 현물 기준으로 3,117→2,996달러/톤(2/12→2/13)으로 하루에 -3.9% 급락했고, 이후에도 재고 부담·투자심리 변화로 변동성이 계속 커졌다는 분석이 나왔어요. 단기 가격은 내려왔는데 재고·전력비·탄소비용 변수 때문에 언제든 다시 튈 수 있는 구간이라, SEDAM·SCGE 입장에서는 협력사들이 하락분을 가격에 다 안 넘기고 서차지·프리미엄으로 버티려 할 가능성이 커요. Impact는 2/13 LME 현물 일간 -3.9%를 A(-3.9%)로 보고, 알루미늄 비중이 높은 SEDAM 냉장고·SCGE 열교환기 BOM에는 단기적으론 원가 하락 여지가 있지만, 변동성이 커서 평균 단가 관리가 더 중요해진 상황이에요. 액션: ① 최근 2주 LME 알루미늄 일간 변동률 기준으로 이동평균(예: 10일) 가격에 연동되는 단가 조정 조항을 협력사 계약에 명시 (기한: 2026-02-23) ② SEDAM·SCGE 알루미늄 구매는 Q2까지는 분할 매수 전략 유지하고, 단가 인하 요구 시 ‘LME - 프리미엄’ 분리 네고 (기한: 2026-02-29) ③ EV·전선 수요로 장기 타이트 전망인 만큼 2026년 하반기용 장기계약·헤징 전략 별도 시나리오 수립 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: Westmetall+1, AlCircle+1, BalajiAluminium+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Aluminum recently plummeted -3.9% in a single day from 3,117 to $2,996/ton (2/12 to 2/13) on the LME spot basis, and analysis shows that volatility has continued to increase since then due to inventory burden and changes in investor sentiment. Short-term prices have fallen, but they can rebound at any time due to variables such as inventory, electricity costs, and carbon costs. Therefore, from SEDAM and SCGE’s perspective, it is highly likely that their partners will try to hold on with surcharges and premiums rather than passing on the full amount of the decline to the price. Impact is viewed as A(-3.9%) for the daily -3.9% of the 2/13 LME spot price, and although there is room for a short-term cost decrease in the SEDAM refrigerator and SCGE heat exchanger BOMs with a high proportion of aluminum, the high volatility has made average unit price management more important. Actions: ① Include a unit price adjustment clause in the partner contract based on the moving average (e.g., 10-day) price based on the daily fluctuation rate of LME aluminum over the past two weeks (Deadline: 2026-02-23) ② Maintain the split purchase strategy for SEDAM and SCGE aluminum purchases until Q2, and negotiate a separate ‘LME - premium’ when requesting a unit price reduction (Deadline: 2026-02-29) ③ Establish a separate scenario for a long-term contract/hedging strategy for the second half of 2026, given the long-term tight outlook due to EV and cable demand (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-03-15). References: Westmetall+1, AlCircle+1, BalajiAluminium+1
thisWeek.Tag_en: Aluminum, LME, -3.9%, inventory, volatility, EV

thisWeek.Title: 냉매 R454B 급등
thisWeek.Summary: 냉매 쪽은 거래소 상장 상품이 아니라 절대 레벨이 중요한데, 최근 미국 기준으로 R32는 lb당 275~300달러, R454B는 345~375달러 수준으로 R32보다 확실히 비싸게 형성돼 있어요. 특히 R454B는 Honeywell의 +42% 추가 할증과 EU F-Gas/쿼터 수수료(1.401유로/kg)까지 겹치면서, 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨 냉매 원가는 사실상 전년 대비 +20% 이상 올라간 상태로 보는 게 안전해요. Impact는 규제·할증에 따른 냉매 비용 구조 변화를 B(+20%)로 두고, ‘R454B 규제비용(약 +20~25%) × 냉매 원가비(에어컨 BOM 내)’ 구조로 추정하면 성수기 전에 추가 부담이 더 커질 수 있어요. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 2026년 성수기(7~9월) 예상 물량을 기반으로 R32/R454B 장기계약 물량·단가 시나리오 2~3안 마련 (기한: 2026-02-28) ② 미국·EU 규제·쿼터 변동 리스크를 반영해 공급사와 서차지 상한(예: +10%) 합의 시도 (기한: 2026-03-10) ③ 차세대 모델에서 R32/R290 전환 가능한 SKU 우선 선정해 개발 로드맵·조달 플랜 연동 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: QualityComfort+1, CoolingPost+1, FacilitiesDive+1, Schiessl+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Refrigerants are not listed on the exchange, but absolute levels are important. Recently, based on US standards, R32 is $275 to $300 per lb, and R454B is $345 to $375, which are clearly more expensive than R32. In particular, with the +42% additional surcharge from Honeywell and the EU F-Gas/quota fee (1.401 euros/kg) for R454B, it is safe to assume that the cost of air conditioner refrigerants for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE has actually increased by more than +20% year-on-year. Impact is the change in refrigerant cost structure due to regulations and surcharges as B(+20%), and if we estimate it as the ‘R454B regulation cost (approximately +20~25%) × refrigerant cost ratio (within air conditioner BOM)’, the additional burden may increase further before the peak season. Actions: ① Prepare scenarios 2-3 for the volume and unit price of R32/R454B long-term contract based on the expected volume for the peak season (July-September) in 2026 based on Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE (Deadline: 2026-02-28) ② Attempt to agree on a surcharge cap (e.g., +10%) with suppliers, reflecting the risk of fluctuations in US and EU regulations and quotas (Deadline: 2026-03-10) ③ Prioritize selection of SKUs that can be converted to R32/R290 in next-generation models and link them to the development roadmap and procurement plan (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-31). References: QualityComfort+1, CoolingPost+1, FacilitiesDive+1, Schiessl+1
thisWeek.Tag_en: Refrigerant, R454B, regulation, +20%, F-gas, short supply

thisWeek.Title: 냉매 R454B 42%↑
thisWeek.Summary: 미국에선 R454B에 이미 +42% 서차지가 붙어 있고, 최근 1~2년 사이 실린더당 700~2,000달러까지 치솟은 사례가 나올 정도로 가격 레벨이 완전히 한 단계 올라가 있어요. Honeywell·Chemours 모두 R454B에 추가 $/lb 인상과 함께 중국산 냉매에 최대 +145% 관세가 얹히면서, A2L 전환 이후에도 공급 부족·고가 구조가 쉽게 안 풀리는 분위기예요. 삼성 관점에서는 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨에서 쓰는 R32/R454B 조달 리스크가 계속 Very High라, 성수기 이전에 최소 4~6개월치 안전재고와 장기계약을 못 잠가두면 Q3 생산 차질과 긴급구매 단가 폭등 가능성이 커요. Impact는 Honeywell 기준 R454B 서차지 +42%를 그대로 반영하면 냉매비 비중이 높은 에어컨 라인 BOM에선 원가 레벨이 의미 있게 올라간 상태로 보는 게 맞아요. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 2026년 하절기 냉매 수요를 보수적으로 상향 추정해 4~6개월치 커버되는 선적 스케줄 확보 ② 미국·중국·동남아 공급선별로 R32/R454B 장기계약 재협상(가격 상한·리드타임·배분조건 명시, 기한: 2026-03-15) ③ 중장기적으로 R32·R290 전환 모델 확대 로드맵을 개발·구매·품질 합동으로 업데이트 (우선순위: 상). 참고: CoolingPost+1, ACHRNews+1, AristotleAir+1, SSIservices+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: In the US, R454B already has a +42% surcharge, and the price level has completely gone up to $700-$2,000 per cylinder in the past 1-2 years. With both Honeywell and Chemours an additional $/lb increase on R454B and tariffs of up to +145% on Chinese refrigerants, the atmosphere is that the supply shortage and high price structure will not be easily resolved even after the A2L transition. From Samsung's perspective, the risk of procurement of R32/R454B used in Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioners continues to be Very High, so if they cannot lock in at least 4-6 months' worth of safety stock and long-term contracts before the peak season, there is a high possibility of production disruptions in Q3 and a surge in emergency purchase prices. If the R454B surcharge +42% based on Honeywell is directly reflected, it is correct to see that the cost level has meaningfully increased in the BOM of the air conditioner line, which has a high proportion of refrigerant costs. Actions: ① Secure a shipment schedule covering 4-6 months by conservatively estimating upward the 2026 summer refrigerant demand based on Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE standards. ② Renegotiate long-term R32/R454B contracts for suppliers from the US, China, and Southeast Asia (specify price caps, lead times, and distribution conditions; deadline: March 15, 2026). ③ Jointly develop, purchase, and quality a roadmap for expanding the R32/R290 conversion model in the mid- to long-term (priority: high). References: CoolingPost+1, ACHRNews+1, AristotleAir+1, SSIservices+1

lastWeek.Summary: 알루미늄이 3,111.65달러/톤까지 뛰면서 직전 거래일 대비 +2.52% 급등했어요.tradingeconomics+1 한 달 변동은 크지 않지만, 최근 몇 주간 3,000달러선을 상향 돌파한 뒤 고점권을 유지 중이라 SEDAM·SCGE 입장에서는 냉장고 패널·히트싱크 알루미늄 원가가 예전보다 확실히 무거운 구간이에요.westmetall​ 일간 +2.5% 급등 구간이라 SEDAM 냉장고·SCGE 에어컨의 알루미늄 사용 비중만큼 BOM이 바로 튀어 오를 수 있어서, 단가 인상 요청이 들어오기 전에 네고 기준과 대체 소재 플랜을 선제 정리해두는 게 좋아요. 액션: ① 알루미늄 +5%·환율 1,500원 스트레스 시나리오로 SEDAM·SCGE BOM 영향도 산출 ② 멕시코·국내 알루미늄 협력사와 “알루미늄 인상분의 70%까지만 단가 반영” 룰 협의(우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-12) ③ 구조적으로 알루미늄 사용량을 줄일 수 있는 설계변경(패널 두께 최적화, 강판 전환 등) 과제 리스트업 및 2026년 개발 로드맵 연계(우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-01). 참고: TradingEconomics+1, Westmetall+1, Worthwill+1

lastWeek.Title: R32·R454B 타이트
lastWeek.Summary: 단기 시황 데이터는 많지 않지만, 작년부터 이어진 R454B 42% 서차지+단가 인상이 아직 유효하고, 현장 기준으로는 R32가 275~300달러/lb, R454B가 345~375달러/lb 정도로 꽤 높은 레벨에서 형성돼 있어요.achrnews+2 미국·EU 규제와 실린더 부족 여파로 R454B는 여전히 품귀에 가깝고, 2026년에도 R32·R454B가 주력 냉매로 자리 잡는 방향이라 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨 냉매 원가는 쉽게 내려가기 어려운 구조예요.facilitiesdive+1 R454B 누적 인상(42%+α) × 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨 냉매 비중만큼 BOM이 이미 한 레벨 올라와 있어서, 추가 인상보다 “고가 수준 고착” 리스크에 대비해 장기 물량·가격을 묶어두는 게 핵심이에요. 액션: ① R32/R454B 주요 공급사별 2026~2027년 물량·단가·패널티 조건 비교표 작성 ② 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 연간 냉매 사용량의 70~80%를 커버하는 장기계약 안 시뮬레이션(우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-15) ③ 중장기적으로 R32·R290 등 대체 냉매 적용 모델 확대 로드맵을 개발·품질과 공동 수립해 냉매 믹스 리스크 분산(우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: ACHRNews+1, FacilitiesDive+1, CoolingPost+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: There is not much short-term market data, but the 42% surcharge + unit price increase for R454B that has continued since last year is still valid, and on a field basis, R32 is at a fairly high level of $275-$300/lb and R454B is at a level of $345-$375/lb. achrnews+2 Due to the US and EU regulations and cylinder shortage, R454B is still close to being in short supply, and since R32 and R454B are expected to be the main refrigerants even in 2026, it is difficult for the cost of refrigerants for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioners to go down easily. facilitiesdive+1 Cumulative increase in R454B (42%+α) × Since the BOM has already risen by one level by the proportion of refrigerants for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioners, it is better to prepare for the risk of “high price fixation” rather than additional increases. The key is to secure long-term volume and price. Actions: ① Create a comparison table of volume, unit price, and penalty conditions for major R32/R454B suppliers for 2026-2027. ② Simulate a long-term contract that covers 70-80% of the annual refrigerant usage based on Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-15). ③ Develop a roadmap for expanding the application of alternative refrigerants such as R32 and R290 in the mid- to long-term. Jointly establish it with quality to disperse refrigerant mix risks (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-03-15). References: ACHRNews+1, FacilitiesDive+1, CoolingPost+1

lastWeek.Title: R32/R454B 규제강화
lastWeek.Summary: 미국·EU에서 저 GWP 냉매 규제로 R32·R454B 수요는 급증 중이지만 R454B는 공급 부족으로 실수요가 17달러→60달러/lb까지 치솟은 사례가 있어요. EU는 2025~26년 HFC/HFO 쿼터를 2023년 대비 -48%로 감축해 저 GWP 전환을 강하게 밀고 있고, Honeywell도 R454B에 +42% 관세 서차지를 부과했어요. 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨용 냉매는 이미 R454B 기준으로 BOM 비중이 크게 늘어난 상황이라, 이 지점에서 R454B 확대 채택 대신 R32·R290 중심 설계로 전환 범위를 넓히는 쪽이 구매팀에선 가장 현실적인 리스크 회피 전략이에요. Impact: R454B 단가 +42% 서차지 × 광주·SEHC·TSE BOM 냉매 비중(2~4%) ≈ 각 제품군 BOM 약 +0.8~1.6% 추가 상승 시나리오; EU 쿼터 -48%로 내년 이후 공급 타이트 기대 → 감가상각·선구매 대비 필요. 삼성 관점: R32는 중국·동남아 다수 공급사가 있어 안정성＋가성비가 좋아, R454B 비중 커진 북미·EU향 설계는 장기적 마진 리스크가 크므로 지속보유·확대가 아니라 축소 대상으로 보는 게 유리. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 냉매 사용량 재산출 후 R32/R454B 시나리오별 BOM 영향 산출 ② R32는 장기계약으로 2~3개 공급사 다원화 확보, 서치지·관세 반영 계약 조건 검토 ③ R454B는 2027년 이전까지 특정 모델만 유지하고 나머지는 R32·R290로 전환하는 로드맵 협의 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-17). 참고: FacilitiesDive+1, Honeywell+1, EU F-gas+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: In the US and EU, demand for R32·R454B is surging due to low-GWP refrigerant regulations, but there is a case where R454B's actual demand has soared from $17/lb to $60/lb due to a supply shortage. The EU is strongly pushing for a low-GWP transition by reducing the HFC/HFO quota by -48% from 2023 to 2025-26, and Honeywell has also imposed a +42% tariff surcharge on R454B. Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioner refrigerants have already significantly increased their BOM proportion based on R454B. Therefore, the most realistic risk-avoidance strategy for the purchasing team is to shift to a design centered on R32 and R290, rather than expanding R454B adoption. Impact: R454B unit price +42% surcharge × Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE BOM refrigerant proportion (2-4%) ≈ Scenario of an additional increase of approximately +0.8-1.6% in each product group's BOM; EU quota -48%, expected to tighten supply from next year → Need to prepare for depreciation and advance purchases. Samsung's perspective: R32 boasts stability and cost-effectiveness due to multiple suppliers in China and Southeast Asia. Designs targeting North America and the EU, with a higher proportion of R454B, carry significant long-term margin risks, making it more advantageous to consider downsizing rather than retaining or expanding. Actions: ① Calculate the BOM impact of each R32/R454B scenario after recalculating the refrigerant usage at Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE. ② Secure diversification of R32 suppliers to 2-3 through long-term contracts, and review contract terms reflecting search and tariffs. ③ Discuss a roadmap for R454B to maintain only certain models until 2027 and transition the rest to R32/R290. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-17) References: FacilitiesDive+1, Honeywell+1, EU F-gas+1

lastWeek.Summary: 어제 구리 가격이 5.77달러/파운드로 전일 대비 -3.21% 크게 빠졌어요.tradingeconomics​ 시장 쪽에선 중국 연휴(춘절) 앞두고 매수 둔화랑 재고 증가가 같이 얘기돼요(재고가 다시 쌓이는 흐름).mining​ 환율 1,440.20원/달러 기준으로 보면, USD 가격 하락분이 바로 원화 구매단가 절감 여지로 연결돼요(원화단가 ≈ USD단가×환율).snmnews​ 삼성 관점: TSE(동남아)·SEHA(북미)에서 모터/배선/콘덴서 구리 구매는 “지금이 단가 리셋” 타이밍일 수 있어요. 액션: ① 이번 주 오퍼에 “전일/주간 평균” 기준 재인용 요청 ② SEHA·TSE 단기 스팟 비중 한시 확대(급한 물량만) ③ 3월물 기준 헤징은 변동성 커서 트리거(예: -2% 추가 하락 시)로 조건부 검토 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-17) 참고: TradingEconomics+1, Mining.com+1, 철강금속신문+1

lastWeek.Title: R454B +42%
lastWeek.Summary: R32는 중국 쿼터(할당) 관리 영향으로 장기계약가가 61,200위안/톤 수준까지 올라갔고(Q4 대비 +1.66% 추정) 공급이 타이트하다는 얘기가 계속 나와요. R454B는 업체가 +42% 서차지 및 +$4/lb 인상 같은 강한 가격조정까지 거론될 정도로 수급/가격 변동성이 커요. 삼성 관점: A2L 전환이 본격화되면 냉매는 “네고”보다 “물량 확보”가 먼저라서, 광주·SEHC·TSE는 선확보 실패가 곧 원가/납기 리스크예요. Impact 근거: R454B 서차지 +42% (공급사 공지 기반) → 해당 냉매 적용 모델은 냉매 조달비가 단기 급등 가능. 액션: ① R32/R454B 공급사 배정물량(할당)·리드타임 즉시 확인 ② Q2~Q3 장기계약(가격조정식·캡) 선제 제안 ③ R32 중심 전환 가능 모델 BOM/인증 일정 점검 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-20). 참고: Frioflor+1, CoolingPost+1, Homepros+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: R32 has seen its long-term contract price rise to 61,200 yuan/ton (estimated +1.66% compared to Q4) due to the impact of China's quota management, and there are persistent talks of tight supply. R454B has such high supply/demand/price volatility that companies are even discussing strong price adjustments such as a +42% surcharge and a +$4/lb increase. Samsung's perspective: When the A2L transition is in full swing, securing refrigerant quantities will take priority over negotiating, so for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE, failure to secure supplies in advance will directly lead to cost/delivery risks. Impact Basis: R454B surcharge +42% (based on supplier notice) → Models applying the refrigerant may see a short-term surge in refrigerant procurement costs. Actions: ① Immediately confirm the R32/R454B supplier allocation (quota) and lead time. ② Proactively propose a long-term contract (price adjustment/cap) for Q2-Q3. ③ Review the BOM/certification schedule for models that can be converted to R32 (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-20). References: Frioflor+1, CoolingPost+1, Homepros+1

thisMonth.Title: R454B 냉매 규제 강화
thisMonth.Summary: EU 냉매 규제 강화 확정됐어요. R454B 공급 부족 심화. Honeywell이 2025년 4월 이미 +42% 서지 실시한 상태. 2026년부터 저GWP 냉매 의무화로 R454B 가격 +20~42% 상승 예상. 광주사업장·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 비용 급증 우려. 삼성 관점: 냉매 공급 계약 긴축 심화 → 장기계약 우선순위 높음. R32 안정성도 점검 필요. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사(Honeywell·Chemours) R454B 확보 전략 수립(기한 2026-02-10) ② 광주·호치민 생산 기지 냉매 공급계약 갱신(R454B +20% 반영) ③ R32 호환 에어컨 모델 개발 협의(기한 2026-03-31) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-10). 참고: EU공식+1, Cooling Post+1
thisMonth.Title_en: Strengthening R454B refrigerant regulations
thisMonth.Summary_en: The EU has confirmed tightening of refrigerant regulations, exacerbating the R454B supply shortage. Honeywell already implemented a +42% surge in April 2025. With the mandatory low-GWP refrigerant requirement starting in 2026, R454B prices are expected to rise by 20-42%. Concerns are growing over the potential surge in refrigerant costs for air conditioners at the Gwangju plant and SEHC. Samsung's perspective: Tightening refrigerant supply contracts → Prioritizing long-term contracts. R32 stability also needs to be reviewed. Actions: ① Develop a strategy to secure R454B from refrigerant suppliers (Honeywell and Chemours) (Deadline: February 10, 2026). ② Renew refrigerant supply contracts for Gwangju and Ho Chi Minh City production sites (refrigerant supply +20% R454B) ③ Discuss the development of R32-compatible air conditioner models (Deadline: March 31, 2026). (Priority: High, Deadline: February 10, 2026). Note: EU Official +1, Cooling Post +1.

thisMonth.Title: EU 냉매 규제 강화, R454B 공급 타이트
thisMonth.Summary: EU가 냉매 규제를 강화하면서 R454B 수급이 타이트해졌어요. 한국도 2025년 '오존층 보호법' 개정으로 HFCs 감축 의무가 확대되었어요. 2027년부터 저GWP 물질 우선 전환, 2029년 상용화 냉매는 의무 전환 예정이에요. 냉매 공급사의 가격 인상이 불가피해 보여요. 광주사업장 에어컨 냉매 비용 +18~20% 상승 예상(업계 추정). 냉매쿼터도 2025년부터 감축폭이 크게 확대되면서, 신규 냉매 확보가 어려워질 것 같아요. 삼성 관점: 광주·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 공급사 가격 협상 어려워질 수 있어요 → 장기계약 선제 필요. R454B 대체(R290, R32 호환 모델) 개발 로드맵 가속화 필요. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 R454B 장기계약 재협상(기한 2026-02-14) ② 광주·SEHC 냉매 공급 계약 갱신(선반영 +20% 검토, 기한 2026-02-28) ③ 저GWP 냉매(R290, R32) 호환 에어컨 모델 개발 가속(상품화 기한 2026-Q3) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-14). 참고: 환경부+2, EU공식+1, 콜드체인뉴스+2
thisMonth.Title_en: Tightening EU refrigerant regulations tighten supply of R454B.
thisMonth.Summary_en: As the EU strengthens refrigerant regulations, the supply of R454B has become tight. South Korea's obligation to reduce HFCs has also been expanded with the revision of the Ozone Layer Protection Act in 2025. The transition to low-GWP materials will be prioritized starting in 2027, and mandatory for commercially available refrigerants starting in 2029. Price increases for refrigerant suppliers appear inevitable. The cost of air conditioner refrigerants at the Gwangju plant is expected to rise by 18-20% (industry estimates). With refrigerant quota reductions also expected to significantly expand starting in 2025, securing new refrigerants is expected to become difficult. Samsung's perspective: Price negotiations with Gwangju and SEHC air conditioner refrigerant suppliers could become difficult → Preemptive long-term contracts are necessary. The development roadmap for R454B replacements (R290, R32 compatible models) needs to be accelerated. Actions: ① Renegotiate the long-term R454B refrigerant supplier contract (deadline: February 14, 2026); ② Renew the Gwangju-SEHC refrigerant supply contract (review of pre-refrigeration +20%, due February 28, 2026); ③ Accelerate the development of air conditioner models compatible with low-GWP refrigerants (R290, R32) (commercialization deadline: Q3, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: February 14, 2026). References: Ministry of Environment +2, EU Official +1, Cold Chain News +2

thisMonth.Title: 냉매 R454B 규제·공급 이중 압박
thisMonth.Summary: EU 냉매 규제 강화+미국 관세 추가로 R454B 시장 타이트해졌어요. 정확한 거래소 현물가격은 없지만 업계 추정 공급 부족으로 프리미엄 가격 유지(+15~20% 추정, 2025년 대비). 광주사업장·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 비용 0.4~0.6% 상승 예상해도 될 것 같아요. 미국 관세 추가 가능성 높으니까 선제 대응이 필요해요. 삼성 관점: 냉매 공급사 가격 협상 거의 불가능 수준 → 장기계약 확보 또는 대체냉매(R32) 호환 제품 개발 필요. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 3~6개월 확보 전략 수립(기한 2026-02-07) ② 광주·SEHC R32 호환 제품 개발 로드맵 협의(기한 2026-02-21) ③ 냉매 선물 헤징 50~60%(상한가 지정, 기한 2026-02-10) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-07). 참고: EU공식+1, Cooling Post+1, 삼성전자 DA+1
thisMonth.Title_en: Dual pressures on refrigerant R454B regulation and supply
thisMonth.Summary_en: The R454B market has tightened due to strengthened EU refrigerant regulations and additional US tariffs. While exact spot prices are not available, industry estimates indicate a supply shortage will maintain a premium (estimated at +15-20% compared to 2025). Refrigerant costs for Gwangju and SEHC air conditioners are expected to rise by 0.4-0.6%. Given the high possibility of additional US tariffs, preemptive action is necessary. Samsung's perspective: Price negotiations with refrigerant suppliers are nearly impossible → Securing long-term contracts or developing products compatible with alternative refrigerants (R32) is necessary. Actions: ① Develop a strategy to secure refrigerant suppliers for 3-6 months (deadline: February 7, 2026); ② Discuss a roadmap for developing R32-compatible products for Gwangju and SEHC (deadline: February 21, 2026); ③ Hedging refrigerant futures by 50-60% (specified upper price limit, deadline: February 10, 2026) (Priority: High; Deadline: February 7, 2026). Note: EU Official +1, Cooling Post +1, Samsung Electronics DA +1

thisMonth.Title: R32·R454B 공급타이트
thisMonth.Summary: 중국 기준 R32 장기계약 가격이 톤당 61,200위안 수준으로 2026년 들어서도 강보합 기조이고, 유럽 조사에서는 R32 가격이 직전 분기 대비 변동 거의 없는(0% 수준) 보합 흐름으로 나와요frioflor+1. 반면 R454B는 2025년부터 이어진 공급 부족과 더불어 주요 메이커(Honeywell 등)가 주문분에 42% 서차지와 추가 단가 인상을 걸어둔 상태라 실질 거래가는 기존 대비 40% 이상 올라 있는 상황이에요ssiservices​. 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨 기준으로 냉매가 BOM의 2%라고 가정하면 R454B +42% × 원가비중 2% → 완제품 원가 약 +0.84% 수준이라, 특히 R454B 채용 비중이 늘어나는 모델은 원가 관리에 부담이 커질 수 있어요. 삼성 관점: 냉매 공급사는 앞으로도 규제·A2L 전환 이슈를 이유로 인상 요구를 지속할 가능성이 높아서, 단기 단가 네고보다는 Q3 피크시즌 물량을 선계약·분산조달로 나눠 가져가는 전략이 더 현실적이에요. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 모델별 냉매 스펙(R32 vs R454B) 비중 재집계 및 2026년 필요 물량 확정(기한 2026-02-15) ② R454B 공급사와 3Q 피크물량의 60~70%를 상반기 중 선계약(상승률 상한 +20%) ③ R32/대체냉매(R290 등) 전환 가능 모델 우선 개발 로드맵에 반영(우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-01). 참고: Frioflor+1, CoolingPost+1, SSIservices+1
thisMonth.Title_en: R32·R454B supply tight
thisMonth.Summary_en: The long-term contract price for R32 in China is expected to remain strong at 61,200 yuan per ton in 2026, and a European survey shows that the price of R32 is showing a flat trend with little change (0%) compared to the previous quarter (frioflor+1). On the other hand, the actual transaction price of R454B is more than 40% higher than before due to the supply shortage that has continued since 2025 and the fact that major manufacturers (such as Honeywell) have imposed a 42% surcharge and additional unit price increase on orders (ssiservices). Assuming that the refrigerant is 2% of the BOM for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioners, R454B +42% × cost ratio 2% → finished product cost of about +0.84%, so cost management may become a burden, especially for models where the proportion of R454B adopted increases. Samsung's perspective: Refrigerant suppliers are likely to continue demanding price increases due to regulatory and A2L transition issues. Therefore, a strategy of dividing the Q3 peak season volume through pre-contracts and distributed procurement is more realistic than short-term unit price negotiations. Actions: ① Recalculate the proportion of refrigerant specifications (R32 vs. R454B) by model in Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE and determine the volume required in 2026 (deadline: 2026-02-15). ② Pre-contract 60-70% of the Q3 peak volume with R454B suppliers in the first half of the year (upper limit of increase +20%). ③ Prioritize the development of models that can be converted to R32/alternative refrigerants (such as R290) and reflect it in the roadmap (priority: high, deadline: 2026-03-01). References: Frioflor+1, CoolingPost+1, SSIservices+1

thisMonth.Title: R454B +42%
thisMonth.Summary: R454B는 공급사(Honeywell) 기준으로 +42% 서차지에 더해 신규 주문 +4달러/파운드 인상까지 걸린 케이스가 있어요(북미 중심). 중국산 R32는 미국에서 반덤핑 관세(AD) 오더가 유지되는지 보는 5년 재심 절차가 진행 중이에요. 냉매는 “대체가 느리고(모델/인증) 수급이 타이트하면 단가가 점프”해서, 광주·SEHC/TSE 에어컨은 조달 타이밍이 원가를 갈라요. Impact 근거: R454B +42%(서차지) × 냉매비중(가정 2%) → 완제품 원가 약 +0.84% 시나리오예요. (R32는 AD 재심으로 비용 불확실성 커서 D 성격도 같이 봐야 돼요) 액션: ① Q2~Q3 냉매 소요를 월별로 쪼개서 선점 물량 확정 ② R454B는 ‘서차지 적용 예외/상한’ 조건으로 재협상 ③ R32/R454B 듀얼소싱(지역 분산) + 용기(실린더) 수급 계약 포함 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-12). 참고: CoolingPost+1, FederalRegister(USITC)+1, FRIOFLOR+1
thisMonth.Summary_en: R454B is facing a +42% surcharge from its supplier (Honeywell) and a +$4/lb increase in new orders (focused on North America). Chinese-made R32 is undergoing a 5-year review process in the US to determine whether the anti-dumping duty (AD) order will be maintained. Refrigerant replacement is slow (model/certification) and supply is tight, causing unit prices to jump. Therefore, for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioners, procurement timing determines the cost. Impact Basis: R454B +42% (surcharge) × refrigerant proportion (assumed 2%) → approximately +0.84% ​​of the finished product cost. (D-type characteristics should also be considered, as R32's cost uncertainty is high due to the AD retrial.) Action: ① Determine the preemptive quantity by dividing the Q2-Q3 refrigerant demand by month. ② Renegotiate R454B with the "surcharge application exception/cap" condition. ③ Includes R32/R454B dual sourcing (regional distribution) + cylinder supply contract (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-12). Reference: CoolingPost+1, FederalRegister(USITC)+1, FRIOFLOR+1

R454B 시장가격 $345~375/lb으로 과거 $17/lb 대비 20배 이상 뛰었어요. 공급 부족이 Q3까지 지속 예상, Honeywell 42% 태리프 할증료 계속 적용 중. 규제 강화(EU 포함)로 냉매 원가 +18~20% 상승 추정돼요. 광주사업장·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 비용 구조 매우 악화되고 있어요. 삼성 관점: 냉매 협력사 가격 협상 거의 불가능 → 장기계약 전환 또는 대체 냉매 전략 필수. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 R454B 최장 공급 조건 협상(계약 기한 2026-01-27) ② 광주·호치민 생산 기지 냉매 공급 계약 갱신(R32·R290 호환 기술 병행, 기한 2026-02-28) ③ 차기 에어컨 모델 냉매 규격 재설정 검토 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-27). 참고: Honeywell+2, Cooling Post+1, ACHR News+1
lastMonth.Title_en: Refrigerant R454B supply extreme
lastMonth.Summary_en: The refrigerant situation is dire. The market price of R454B has jumped more than 20-fold from $17/lb to $345-375/lb. The supply shortage is expected to continue until Q3, and Honeywell is continuing to impose a 42% tariff surcharge. Tightening regulations (including in the EU) are expected to increase refrigerant costs by 18-20%. The air conditioner refrigerant cost structure at the Gwangju plant and SEHC is deteriorating significantly. Samsung's perspective: Price negotiations with refrigerant suppliers are nearly impossible → switching to long-term contracts or adopting alternative refrigerants is essential. Actions include: ① Negotiate the longest supply terms for R454B with refrigerant suppliers (contract deadline: January 27, 2026); ② Renew the refrigerant supply contract for the Gwangju and Ho Chi Minh City production bases (parallel R32/R290 compatibility technology, deadline: February 28, 2026); ③ Review the reconfiguration of refrigerant specifications for the next air conditioner model (priority: high, deadline: January 27, 2026). lastMonth.Title: R454B 규제 강화 임박
lastMonth.Summary: EU F-gas 규제 강화(GWP 150 이하)가 2025년부터 시행 중이고, 미국도 2025년 1월부터 에어컨(GWP 700 이하) 규제 적용 중이에요. R454B 가격이 2021년 대비 약 300% 인상됐어요(현재 17~20 USD/파운드). Honeywell이 2025년 4월 42% 관세 서지를 부과했고, 공급 부족("unprecedented demand") 심화 중이에요. 냉매 시장은 R32(아시아) > R454B(미국) 양분 상황이에요. 삼성 관점: 광주 에어컨 냉매 비용 +18~20% 상승 예상 → 기존 냉매 재고 소진 전략 + 신규 냉매 공급 안정화 필수. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 확보 전략(R32·R454B 듀얼 소싱) ② 광주·SEHC 냉매 공급 계약 갱신(+20% 가격 수용 범위 검토) ③ 저GWP 냉매(R290, R455A) 호환 모델 개발 가속(기한 2026-Q3) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-30). 참고: EU공식문서+1, Honeywell+1, LG·로이터 냉매동향+2
lastMonth.Title_en: R454B regulations are about to be strengthened.
lastMonth.Summary_en: The EU's strengthened F-gas regulations (GWP 150 or less) will be implemented starting in 2025, and the US will also implement regulations for air conditioners (GWP 700 or less) starting in January 2025. The price of R454B has increased by approximately 300% compared to 2021 (currently USD 17-20/lb). Honeywell imposed a 42% tariff surge in April 2025, and supply shortages ("unprecedented demand") are deepening. The refrigerant market is divided between R32 (Asia) and R454B (US). Samsung's perspective: Gwangju air conditioner refrigerant costs are expected to rise by 18-20% → A strategy to clear existing refrigerant inventories and stabilize the supply of new refrigerants are essential. Actions: ① Refrigerant supplier acquisition strategy (dual sourcing of R32 and R454B); ② Renewal of Gwangju and SEHC refrigerant supply contract (review of +20% price acceptance range); ③ Acceleration of development of models compatible with low-GWP refrigerants (R290, R455A) (Deadline: 2026-Q3) (Priority: High; Deadline: 2026-01-30). References: EU official document +1, Honeywell +1, LG and Reuters refrigerant trends +2

lastMonth.Title_en: Copper surges (+2.8%)
lastMonth.Summary_en: The copper bounced back. As of yesterday, COMEX/CFD copper is at $5.94 per pound, up 2.84% from the previous day, 7.9% from one month ago, and 38.8% from the same period last year, so it is at a high point close to the previous high of $6.10. tradingeconomics​ LME 3-month contracts are also being traded in the $13,000 range, and the issue of tight inventory and short-term supply shortages continues. In addition, the spot/futures spread has widened significantly during the rally since mid-January, but has recently returned to contango, so volatility has greatly increased, putting pressure on the cost of SEHA·TSE copper-using products (washing machines, air conditioner condensers, motors, and pipes). metal+2 From Samsung's perspective, if the copper proportion in finished products based on SEHA·TSE is 6-8%, then copper +2.84% x cost proportion 7% x exchange rate 1,467 won is about +0.2%p to BOM. With upward pressure, it seems advantageous to respond conservatively to unit price increases, but to increase the proportion of long-term contracts and hedging rather than spot purchases during short-term surges to spread out the average purchase price. metal+2 Actions: ① Re-evaluate copper usage in Q1~Q2 2026 based on SEHA·TSE, and establish a hedging strategy to purchase two months' worth at a fixed price (or with a call option structure) and the remainder in installments. ② Promote contract renewals with major copper partners (tubes and wires) that include a sliding clause that reflects the conditions of "adjustment if an additional +3% or more surge occurs within one month, and renegotiation for a reduction if a -3% or more decline occurs." ③ List tasks for lightweight aluminum tubes and motors that can reduce copper usage in air conditioners and washing machines and reflect them in the 2026 development roadmap (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-01-26). References: TradingEconomics+1, Metal.com+1, Reuters/Bloomberg+2metal+3

lastMonth.Summary: 2025년 말부터 2026년 초까지 R32/R454B 전환이 본격화되면서 R454B 가격이 파운드당 17~20달러 수준(20lb 실린더 약 345달러)까지 올라와 있고, 일부 미국 유통 기준으로는 2021년 대비 약 300% 인상된 수준이라는 보고가 있어요.aristotleair​ 여기에 Honeywell이 R454B에 대해 순차적으로 15%→8% 인상 후 추가로 +4달러/파운드 인상과 42% 서차지를 부과하는 등achrnews+1 A2L 냉매 쪽은 구조적인 공급 부족·관세·쿼터 영향으로 2025~26년 사이 누적 20% 이상 추가 인상 압력이 걸려 있는 상황이라, 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨·냉장고 냉매 코스트에는 상방 리스크가 상당히 큰 상태예요.frioflor+1 삼성 관점에서 에어컨 기준 냉매 비중을 BOM의 약 2~2.5%로 보고, 단가 +20% 시나리오를 적용하면 냉매 +20% × 원가 비중 2.5% × 환율 1,467원 기준으로 BOM에는 약 +0.5%p 정도의 상방이 생기는 셈이라, 향후 성수기(7~8월) 전까지는 선매입·장기계약·대체냉매 모델 비중 조정이 핵심 과제가 될 것 같아요.frioflor+5 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 2026년 성수기(7~9월) 예상 생산량 기준으로 R32/R454B 3~4개월분을 선계약(고정단가 또는 상한가 옵션 포함)하고, 이후 물량은 시장 가격에 연동시키는 2트랙 조달 전략 수립 ② 주요 냉매 협력사와는 Honeywell 42% 서차지, 2025~26년 쿼터제 강화 자료를 근거로 ‘연간 인상 상한 +10~15%’ 수준으로 캡을 설정한 장기계약(2~3년)을 제안 ③ 중장기적으로는 R290 등 자연냉매 적용 가능 모델 확대, 냉매 충전량 절감 설계(소형화·마이크로채널 열교환기) 프로젝트를 개발·구매 공동 과제로 정의 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-10). 참고: FRIOFLOR+1, ACHR News+1, FacilitiesDive+1, AristotleAir+1, EnviroControlSystems+1frioflor+4
lastMonth.Title_en: R32/R454B tight
lastMonth.Summary_en: From late 2025 to early 2026, as the transition to R32/R454B begins in earnest, the price of R454B has risen to $17-$20 per pound (about $345 for a 20lb cylinder), and some US distributors report that it has increased by about 300% compared to 2021. aristotleair​ In addition, Honeywell has sequentially increased the price of R454B from 15% to 8%, and is imposing an additional $4/pound increase and a 42% surcharge. acrnews+1 The A2L refrigerant side is facing a cumulative additional increase of more than 20% between 2025 and 2026 due to structural supply shortages, tariffs, and quotas, so there is a significant upward risk in the cost of refrigerants for air conditioners, refrigerators, and Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE. frioflor+1 From Samsung's perspective, the proportion of refrigerants for air conditioners is estimated to be about 2-2.5% of the BOM, and the unit price If the +20% scenario is applied, the BOM will see an upward movement of about +0.5%p based on the refrigerant +20% × cost ratio 2.5% × exchange rate of 1,467 won. Therefore, it seems that adjusting the proportion of pre-purchases, long-term contracts, and alternative refrigerant models will be key tasks until the peak season (July-August). frioflor+5 Action: ① Establish a two-track procurement strategy to pre-contract (including fixed price or upper price option) 3-4 months worth of R32/R454B based on the expected production volume for the peak season (July-September) in 2026 based on Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE, and link subsequent volumes to market prices. ② Propose a long-term contract (2-3 years) with major refrigerant partners with a 42% surcharge from Honeywell and a cap set at the level of ‘annual increase upper limit +10-15%’ based on data on the strengthened quota system in 2025-26. ③ Possibility of application of natural refrigerants such as R290 in the mid- to long-term. The project to expand the model and reduce refrigerant charge (miniaturized, microchannel heat exchanger) was defined as a joint development and procurement project (Priority: High, Deadline: February 10, 2026). References: FRIOFLOR+1, ACHR News+1, FacilitiesDive+1, AristotleAir+1, EnviroControlSystems+1, frioflor+4

lastMonth.Title: 냉매 규제 강화, 가격 급등 임박
lastMonth.Summary: 중국 HFC 금지(2026.01.01 시행) + EU F-gas 규제 강화로 냉매 공급 타이트해졌어요. R454B·R32 전환 가속화되면서 기존 냉매 가격 +18~20% 상승 예상. 광주사업장·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 비용 대폭 증가 임박. 삼성 관점: 냉매 공급사 가격 인상 협상 피하기 어렵고, 장기계약 체결 시급. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 R454B 확보 전략 수립(2026년 Q1 납입량 고정, 기한 2026-02-07) ② 광주·호치민 냉매 공급 장기계약 갱신(GWP 규제 크리프 +20% 선반영, 기한 2026-02-14) ③ R290·R32 호환 모델 개발 가속(2026 신모델 적용 검토, 기한 2026-02-21) (우선순위: 상, 기한 2026-02-07). 참고: 생태환경부+1, EU공식+1, 냉동공조협회+1
lastMonth.Title_en: Refrigerant regulations tighten, prices surge imminent
lastMonth.Summary_en: Refrigerant supply is tightening due to the Chinese HFC ban (effective January 1, 2026) and the strengthening of EU F-gas regulations. As the transition to R454B and R32 accelerates, prices of existing refrigerants are expected to rise by 18-20%. A significant increase in refrigerant costs for air conditioners at the Gwangju plant and SEHC is imminent. Samsung's perspective: It is difficult to avoid price increase negotiations with refrigerant suppliers, and long-term contracts must be signed as soon as possible. Actions: ① Establish a strategy to secure R454B from refrigerant suppliers (fixed delivery volume for Q1 2026, due February 7, 2026); ② Renew long-term refrigerant supply contracts in Gwangju and Ho Chi Minh City (pre-refrigerant for GWP regulation creep +20%, due February 14, 2026); ③ Accelerate development of R290 and R32 compatible models (review for application to new models in 2026, due February 21, 2026) (Priority: High, due February 7, 2026). Reference: Ministry of Environment +1, EU Official +1, Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Association +1

thisWeek.Summary: 미 상무부가 중국산 배터리용 흑연(active anode material)에 대한 최종 AD/CVD 조사에서 관세·관세보조금 합산 부담을 최소 160% 이상으로 크게 올렸어요.globenewswire+3 배터리용 중국산 흑연에만 국한된 조치지만, 유사한 무역구제가 모터·전자부품·철강 등으로 번지면 삼성 DA 수입 원가가 중장기적으로 최대 +1~2%까지 단계적으로 올라갈 수 있는 리스크예요(C기준). 지금 당장은 EV·ESS 쪽 영향이 크지만, 리튬이온 배터리를 쓰는 무선 청소기·로봇청소기·프리미엄 빌트인 제품 쪽 배터리·모듈 단가가 오르면 완제품 원가와 가격 경쟁력에 부담이 될 수 있어요. 액션: ① 3월 예정된 미 ITC 최종 판정 결과 모니터링 ② DA 제품군 중 중국산 배터리·모터 의존도가 높은 BOM 리스트업 및 대체 공급선(미국·한국·제3국) 검토 ③ 2026~2027년 배터리류 중장기 구매계약/헤지 전략에 관세 리스크 반영 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: StrategicEnergy+1, ESS뉴스+1, MercomIndia+1
thisWeek.Title_en: US and China impose 160% tariffs on graphite
thisWeek.Summary_en: The U.S. Department of Commerce has significantly increased the combined tariff and tariff subsidy burden to at least 160% in its final AD/CVD investigation into Chinese graphite for batteries (active anode material).globenewswire+3 Although this measure is limited to Chinese graphite for batteries, if similar trade relief spreads to motors, electronic components, steel, etc., there is a risk that Samsung's DA import cost could gradually increase by up to +1~2% in the mid to long term (based on C). The immediate impact is greater for EVs and ESS, but if the unit price of batteries and modules for cordless vacuum cleaners, robot vacuum cleaners, and premium built-in products that use lithium-ion batteries rises, it could put a burden on the cost of finished products and their price competitiveness. Actions: ① Monitor the final US ITC ruling scheduled for March. ② List BOMs for DA products heavily reliant on Chinese batteries and motors and review alternative supply sources (US, Korea, third countries). ③ Incorporate tariff risks into mid- to long-term battery purchase contracts and hedging strategies for 2026-2027 (Priority: High, Deadline: March 31, 2026). References: StrategicEnergy+1, ESSNews+1, MercomIndia+1

thisWeek.Title: 미국 금속·칩 관세 리스크 지속
thisWeek.Summary: 미국이 트럼프 2기에서도 철강·알루미늄 관세를 유지하면서, 일부 품목에 대한 완화 가능성을 검토하는 한편 반도체(25%), 반가공 구리(50%) 등에 대한 고율 관세 옵션과 조사를 진행 중이에요reuters+5. <mark>구리·반도체 관세가 실제로 발효되면 글로벌 시세를 밀어 올려, DA의 컴프레서·모터 코일·PCB·배선 등 구리·칩 사용 부품 원가가 수%대까지 상승할 수 있는 잠재 리스크가 있어요.</mark> 아직 일부는 제안·조사 단계라 당장 관세 코스트가 발생하진 않지만, 중국 등 특정 국가에 대한 관세·수출통제 강화와 맞물려 공급망 불확실성이 커지고 있어서, 장기 조달선 다변화와 우호국 중심의 미국향 생산 전략이 더 중요해졌어요linkedin+3. DA 입장에서는 미국향 완제품·부품에 대해 HS 코드 기준으로 직·간접 관세 노출을 정리하고, 관세 5~10%p 변화 시 제품별 마진 영향도를 숫자로 시뮬레이션해 두는 게 필요해요. 액션: ① USTR·Trump Tariff Tracker 기준 철강·알루미늄·구리·반도체 관세 현황/제안 리스트를 HS 코드 단위로 정리 ② DA 주요 BOM(컴프레서, 모터, PCB, 배선 등)에 매핑해 직접 관세 vs 글로벌 시세 영향 구분 ③ 관세 5%p·10%p 변동 시 협력사 단가 조정 공식·패스스루 비율을 계약에 사전 반영 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: USTR공식자료+1, Reuters+2, BakerBotts Tariff Tracker+1, TradeComplianceHub+1, 기타 리서치+1reuters+5
thisWeek.Title_en: US metal and chip tariff risks persist
thisWeek.Summary_en: The United States is maintaining tariffs on steel and aluminum during Trump's second term, while examining the possibility of easing tariffs on some items and investigating high-rate tariff options for semiconductors (25%) and semi-finished copper (50%). (reuters+5) <mark>If the copper and semiconductor tariffs actually take effect, there is a potential risk that they will push up global prices, causing the cost of copper and chip-using parts such as DA's compressors, motor coils, PCBs, and wiring to rise by several percent.</mark> Some are still in the proposal and investigation stage, so there will be no immediate tariff costs. However, supply chain uncertainty is increasing due to the strengthening of tariffs and export controls on certain countries such as China, making it more important to diversify long-term supply sources and adopt a production strategy centered on friendly countries for the United States. (linkedin+3) From the DA's perspective, it is necessary to organize direct and indirect tariff exposures based on HS codes for finished products and parts for the United States and to numerically simulate the impact of a 5-10 percentage point change in tariffs on each product's margins. Action: ① Organize the current status/proposal of tariffs on steel, aluminum, copper, and semiconductors by HS code based on the USTR/Trump Tariff Tracker. ② Map the DA's key BOMs (compressors, motors, PCBs, wiring, etc.) to distinguish between direct tariffs and global market impacts. ③ In case of a 5%p/10%p tariff change, reflect the unit price adjustment formula and pass-through ratio for suppliers in advance in contracts. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-31). References: USTR official data +1, Reuters +2, BakerBotts Tariff Tracker +1, TradeComplianceHub +1, other research +1, reuters +5

thisWeek.Title: 미국 철강관세 50%
thisWeek.Summary: 미국 무역대표부(USTR)의 Jamieson Greer가 2월 17일 인터뷰에서 철강·알루미늄 제품에 대한 폭넓은 관세 구조는 유지하되, 일부 적용·집행 방식만 조정할 수 있다고 언급하면서, 외국산 금속에 대한 50% 관세(Section 232)가 계속 간다는 신호를 줬어요. 철강·알루미늄에 대한 고율 관세가 유지되면, 미국향 세탁기·냉장고 등에서 금속 비중이 5~6% 수준이라고 가정할 때, 관세 효과 포함 시 삼성 DA의 미국 수출 기준 BOM 원가가 관세 이전 대비 대략 2~3% 높게 고착될 수 있어요. 이번 발언은 신규 인상은 아니지만, 관세가 단기간에 크게 낮아지기 어렵다는 쪽으로 무게가 실리면서, 미국 내 조달·생산(현지 조강·코일 사용)과 제3국 조달선 리스크(한국·멕시코·베트남 등)를 재점검할 필요가 있어요. 삼성 입장에서는 미국향 스틸·알루미늄 사용 비중이 높은 모델(대형 냉장고, 건조기 등)을 우선으로, HS 코드별 관세 노출을 다시 매핑하고, 관세 50% 유지·부분 완화·전면 완화 3가지 시나리오별로 원가·판매가 방어 전략을 준비하는 게 좋겠어요. 액션: ① Section 232 관련 향후 구체 개정안(품목 범위·예외) 모니터링 ② 미국향 DA 제품별 금속 비중·HS 코드 기준 관세 노출 리스트업 ③ 관세 50% 유지 시와 30%·0% 가정 시 BOM·마진 시뮬레이션 및 대체 조달선(미국/제3국) 옵션 정리 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: Bloomberg+1, Investing.com+1, Reuters+1, USTR+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: In a February 17 interview, Jamieson Greer of the Office of the United States Trade Representative (USTR) signaled that the 50% tariff on foreign metals (Section 232) will continue, stating that the broad tariff structure on steel and aluminum products will be maintained, but only some of the application and enforcement methods may be adjusted. If the high tariffs on steel and aluminum are maintained, assuming that the metal proportion in washing machines and refrigerators destined for the US is around 5-6%, the BOM cost for Samsung DA exports to the US, including the tariff effect, could be fixed at approximately 2-3% higher than before the tariff. This statement does not constitute a new increase, but as the weight is growing that it is difficult for tariffs to be significantly lowered in the short term, there is a need to re-examine domestic procurement and production (use of local crude steel and coil) and third-country procurement risks (Korea, Mexico, Vietnam, etc.). Samsung should prioritize models with a high proportion of US-bound steel and aluminum (such as large refrigerators and dryers), remap tariff exposure by HS code, and prepare cost and selling price defense strategies for three scenarios: maintaining 50% tariffs, partially easing them, and fully easing them. Actions: ① Monitor future specific amendments to Section 232 (product scope and exceptions); ② List tariff exposures by metal content and HS code for US-bound DA products; ③ Simulate BOMs and margins and organize alternative supply source (US/third countries) options under 50% tariffs, 30% tariffs, and 0% tariffs (Priority: High; Deadline: 2026-03-15). References: Bloomberg+1, Investing.com+1, Reuters+1, USTR+1

thisWeek.Title: 미국 철강관세 50% 유지
thisWeek.Summary: 미국이 여전히 외국산 철강·알루미늄에 최대 50% 관세를 유지하면서, 다만 기업들의 복잡한 신고 부담을 줄이기 위한 집행 방식 조정을 검토 중이라는 발언이 나왔어요. 관세율(50%) 자체는 유지된다는 점에서, 글로벌 철강·알루미늄 가격 상단이 쉽게 낮아지기 어렵고 미국향 완제품·부품 기준으로는 원가가 최소 수% 이상 높은 수준에서 고착될 가능성이 커요. 특히 미국은 한국·EU 등과의 합의 이후에도 일부 기초 소재에는 50% 수준의 고율 관세를 유지하고 있어, 미국 내 조달 또는 미국행 수출 비중이 높은 DA 제품에서는 판재·프레임·모터 등 금속 사용 부품 기준으로 C(+3%) 수준의 구조적 원가 부담이 계속될 수 있어요. 삼성 입장에서는 미국 시장향 세탁기·냉장고·빌트인 제품에서 미국산/제3국산/국내산 소재·부품 조합을 다시 점검하고, 관세 50%가 계속 유지되는 전제하에서 어떤 조달 구조가 총원가 기준으로 가장 유리한지 재계산할 필요가 있어요. 액션: ① 미국 철강·알루미늄 관세 관련 향후 세부 집행지침(예: 품목별 예외, 인증 절차) 모니터링 ② 미국 생산법인/수출법인별로 관세 50% 유지·25% 완화·0% 예외 등 3가지 시나리오 기준 BOM 원가 테이블 업데이트 ③ 2026~2027년 미국향 신규 프로젝트(신모델·신라인업) 기획 시, 관세 50% 장기 지속을 기본 전제로 조달선 다변화·현지 조달 확대 옵션 검토 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: YahooFinance+1, GlobalTradeAlert+1, Wipfli+1, 정책브리프+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: The United States is reportedly considering adjusting its enforcement methods to reduce the burden of complex reporting on companies, while still maintaining tariffs of up to 50% on imported steel and aluminum. Given that the tariff rate itself remains in place, it's unlikely the upper end of global steel and aluminum prices will easily fall, and the cost of finished products and parts destined for the United States is likely to remain at a level that's at least several percentage points higher. In particular, the United States maintains a high tariff rate of around 50% on some basic materials even after agreements with Korea, the EU, and others. Therefore, for DA products with a high proportion of domestic procurement or exports to the United States, a structural cost burden of around C (+3%) could persist for metal components such as plates, frames, and motors. Samsung needs to reexamine the mix of US/third-party/domestic materials and parts for its washing machines, refrigerators, and built-in products destined for the US market, and recalculate which procurement structure is most advantageous in terms of total cost, assuming the 50% tariff remains in place. Actions: ① Monitor future detailed enforcement guidelines (e.g., product-specific exceptions and certification procedures) related to US steel and aluminum tariffs. ② Update BOM cost tables based on three scenarios for US production and export corporations: maintaining 50% tariffs, reducing 25% tariffs, and implementing 0% tariffs. ③ When planning new US-bound projects (new models and new lineups) for 2026-2027, review options to diversify procurement sources and expand local procurement, based on the assumption of a long-term 50% tariff. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-03-15) References: YahooFinance+1, GlobalTradeAlert+1, Wipfli+1, Policy Brief+1

thisWeek.Title: USD/KRW 1,440원대 보합
thisWeek.Summary: USD/KRW가 최근 한 달 동안 원화 강세 영향으로 1,440원대에서 비교적 안정적으로 움직이고 있어요tradingeconomics+2. 원화가 한 달 기준 약 1.5% 강해지면서, 달러 결제 수입 원자재비를 이론상 약 1.5% 절감할 수 있는 구간이에요. DA 기준으로 철강·구리·레진·전자부품 등 달러 결제 비중을 50%로 가정하면 완제품 원가에는 약 0.7%p 수준의 비용 절감 여지가 생겨요. 환율 변동성이 크지 않아서, 지금은 협력사와 달러 코스트 기준의 단가 재협상이나 중장기 LTA 환율 조건을 조정하기 좋은 타이밍이에요. 액션: ① 1,440원대를 기준선으로 HRC·구리·레진·컴프레서 등 주요 품목 원화 단가 재계산 ② 최근 1개월 환율 효과(약 -1.5%)를 반영한 재료비 예산 업데이트 ③ 환율 1,450원·1,500원 시나리오별 DA 제품 원가 민감도 테이블 유지 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-28). 참고: 한국은행+1(지표누리), TradingEconomics+1, Wise+1, XE+1, Yahoo Finance+1tradingeconomics+5
thisWeek.Summary_en: USD/KRW has been moving relatively steadily in the 1,440 won range over the past month due to the strengthening of the won (tradingeconomics+2). With the won strengthening by about 1.5% on a monthly basis, this is a range where the cost of imported raw materials settled in dollars can theoretically be reduced by about 1.5%. Assuming that the proportion of dollar settlement for steel, copper, resin, and electronic components is 50% based on DA, there is room for cost savings of about 0.7%p in the cost of finished products. Since the exchange rate volatility is not high, now is a good time to renegotiate unit prices based on dollar cost with partners or adjust the mid- to long-term LTA exchange rate conditions. Actions: ① Recalculate the Korean Won unit prices of major items such as HRC, copper, resin, and compressors based on the KRW 1,440 range. ② Update the material cost budget reflecting the exchange rate effect (approximately -1.5%) over the past month. ③ Maintain a table of DA product cost sensitivity by exchange rate scenarios of KRW 1,450 and KRW 1,500 (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-02-28). References: Bank of Korea +1 (Jibyonuri), TradingEconomics +1, Wise +1, XE +1, Yahoo Finance +1, tradingeconomics +5

lastWeek.Title: 美 한국 관세 25% 위협
lastWeek.Summary: 트럼프가 한국산 제품에 관세 25% 인상 위협을 지속하고 있어요. 자동차·제약 중심이지만 가전·철강 확대 우려가 커요. 미국향 수출 DA 완제품·부품 원가에 2~5% 쇼크 가능성이 상존해요. 공급망 재배치가 시급해 보입니다. 액션: ① 관세 품목·발효일 모니터링 ② 미국향 물량 시나리오 플랜 ③ 대체 소싱 후보 리스트업 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-20). 참고: Reuters+1, Politico+1, BBC+1
lastWeek.Title_en: US threatens 25% tariffs on South Korea
lastWeek.Summary_en: Trump continues to threaten to raise tariffs by 25% on Korean products. While the target is primarily automobiles and pharmaceuticals, concerns are growing about the potential expansion to home appliances and steel. There's a persistent possibility of a 2-5% shock to the cost of finished goods and components exported to the US. Supply chain restructuring appears urgent. Actions include: ① Monitoring tariff items and effective dates, ② Planning scenarios for US-bound volumes, and ③ Listing alternative sourcing options (Priority: High, Deadline: February 20, 2026). lastWeek.Title: 미국對韓관세25%
lastWeek.Summary: 미국이 1월 말 발표한 대로 한국산 자동차·목재·의약품 등에 대한 상호관세를 15%→25%로 인상한 가운데,reuters+1 2월 10일 한국 정부는 통상추진위원회를 열어 비관세 장벽 이슈가 해결되지 않으면 관세를 예정대로 25%로 유지·확대하겠다는 미국 측 입장에 대응 전략을 논의했어요.seoul​ 현재 직접 타깃은 자동차·목재·의약품이지만, 한미 관세틀 전체가 25% 상단으로 경직될 경우 가전 완제품·부품(강판, 구리, 모터, 컴프레서 등)에도 동일 수준이 적용될 리스크가 있어, 대미 수출 중심 DA 라인 기준으로 원가가 약 2~3% 추가 상승하는 C레벨 충격(C(+2~3%)) 시나리오를 열어두는 게 안전해요. 예를 들어 한국에서 생산해 미국으로 수출하는 냉장고/세탁기에서 관세가 15%→25%로 10%p 오르면, FOB 기준 제품단가의 20~30%가 관세 대상이라고 가정할 때 완제품 원가가 약 2~3% 올라가는 구조예요. 액션: ① 대미 수출 비중이 높은 DA 모델(한국·베트남 생산분)의 관세 15%/25% 더블 시나리오별 매출·마진 영향 재계산 ② 미국 내 생산(현지 공장, EMS) 전환 시 원가·물류·관세 총비용 비교 ③ 25% 관세가 철강·구리·기타 DA 부품까지 확산될 경우를 가정해 대체 조달선(미국·멕시코·FTA 우대국) 후보와 전환 리드타임 정리 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-20). 참고: Reuters+1, BBC+1, 서울경제+1
lastWeek.Title_en: 25% tariff on US goods from Korea
lastWeek.Summary_en: As the U.S. raised the reciprocal tariffs on Korean automobiles, lumber, pharmaceuticals, etc. from 15% to 25% as announced at the end of January, the Korean government held a Trade Promotion Committee meeting on February 10 to discuss a response strategy to the U.S. position that it would maintain or expand the tariffs at 25% as scheduled if non-tariff barrier issues are not resolved. seoul​ Currently, the direct targets are automobiles, lumber, and pharmaceuticals, but if the entire Korea-U.S. tariff framework is rigidized to the upper 25%, there is a risk that the same level will be applied to home appliance finished products and parts (steel plates, copper, motors, compressors, etc.). Therefore, it is safe to leave open the C-level shock (C(+2~3%)) scenario, in which the cost increases by an additional 2~3% based on the DA line centered on exports to the U.S. For example, if the tariff on refrigerators and washing machines produced in Korea and exported to the U.S. is raised from 15% to 25%, If the tariff increases by 10%p, assuming that 20-30% of the FOB unit price is subject to tariffs, the cost of finished products will increase by approximately 2-3%. Actions: ① Recalculate the sales and margin impacts for the DA model (produced in Korea and Vietnam) with a high proportion of US exports under a 15%/25% double tariff scenario. ② Compare the total cost of production, logistics, and tariffs when switching to US production (local factories, EMS). ③ Assuming that the 25% tariff extends to steel, copper, and other DA components, identify alternative procurement sources (US, Mexico, and FTA preferential countries) and organize transition lead times. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-20) References: Reuters+1, BBC+1, Seoul Economic Daily+1

lastWeek.Title: 미-대만 관세 15% 합의
lastWeek.Summary: 미국과 대만이 상호 관세를 조정하는 새 협정을 최종 확정하면서, 미국의 대만산 수입품 관세 상한이 15%로 설정되고 대만은 미국산 에너지·농산물·설비에 대한 관세를 단계적으로 낮추기로 했어요. 직접적인 가전 관세 변화는 없지만, 미국 내 전력설비·강재·기계류에서 대만산의 가격 경쟁력이 올라가면서 한국산 설비·소재 대비 가격 압박이 커질 수 있는 구조예요. 이번 관세 구조 변화가 당장 삼성 DA의 수입 원자재비를 바로 움직이지는 않아 C(±0%)로 보되, 미국향 철강·전력설비 공급망에서 한국 업체가 마진 압박을 받으면 향후 단가 인상 요구가 들어올 수 있는 리스크는 존재해요. 삼성 입장에서는 미국향 매출 비중이 큰 철강·구리 가공품, 모터·압축기·전력 부품 협력사를 중심으로 대만 경쟁사와의 가격 갭, 관세 차이에 따른 협상력 변화를 점검할 필요가 있어요. 액션: ① 미-대만 관세 협정 세부 품목표 입수 후 DA 관련 철강·기계·전력 부품 해당 여부 매핑 ② 미국향 비중이 큰 국내 협력사 대상으로 관세 변화에 따른 마진 압박·단가 인상 요구 가능성 인터뷰 ③ 2분기 이후 미국향 조달선 다변화(미국·멕시코·대만 공급사) 시나리오 정리 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: Reuters+1, USCommerce+1, Bloomberg+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: As the United States and Taiwan finalized a new agreement to adjust mutual tariffs, the U.S. tariff cap on Taiwanese imports was set at 15%, while Taiwan agreed to gradually lower tariffs on U.S. energy, agricultural products, and equipment. While there will be no direct changes to the home appliance tariffs, the structure is such that Taiwanese products will become more price competitive in power equipment, steel, and machinery in the U.S., which could increase price pressure compared to Korean equipment and materials. This change in the tariff structure will not immediately affect Samsung DA's imported raw material costs, so it is considered C (±0%). However, there is a risk that Korean companies in the U.S. steel and power equipment supply chain could face margin pressure, leading to future price increases. From Samsung's perspective, it is necessary to monitor the price gap with Taiwanese competitors and any changes in their negotiating power due to tariff differences, focusing on suppliers that sell a large portion of their steel and copper products, motors, compressors, and power components to the U.S. Actions: ① Obtain a detailed list of items under the US-Taiwan Tariff Agreement and map whether steel, machinery, and power components are subject to the DA. ② Interview domestic suppliers with significant US-bound shipments to assess the potential for margin pressure and price increases due to tariff changes. ③ Develop scenarios for diversifying US-bound suppliers (US, Mexican, and Taiwanese suppliers) after the second quarter. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: March 31, 2026). References: Reuters+1, USCommerce+1, Bloomberg+1

lastWeek.Title: USD/KRW 1,464원 약세
lastWeek.Summary: USD/KRW 환율이 1,464원 중반으로 지난 한 달간 1.1% 원화 약세를 보였어요. Fed 동결+달러 강세 지속으로 수입 자재(HRC,구리,컴프레서) 비용이 0.6% 추가 상승 압력이 걸려 Q1 원가 목표에 차질이 생길 수 있어요. 삼성 관점으로는 환율 고착화 시 BOM 단가 방어가 어려워질 거예요. 액션: ① 환율 일일 모니터링(매일 09:00 한국은행 기준) ② 자재별 민감도 재계산(달러 비중 60% 가정) ③ 1,450/1,500원 시나리오 가격 협상 시뮬 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-15). 참고: 한국은행+1, TradingEconomics+1, Wise+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: The USD/KRW exchange rate has weakened by 1.1% over the past month, reaching the mid-1,464 won range. With the Fed's freeze and the continued strength of the dollar, the cost of imported materials (HRC, copper, compressors) could rise by an additional 0.6%, potentially disrupting the Q1 cost target. From Samsung's perspective, a persistently high exchange rate will make it difficult to defend BOM unit prices. Actions: ① Daily exchange rate monitoring (based on the Bank of Korea daily at 09:00). ② Recalculate sensitivity by material (assuming a 60% dollar weighting). ③ Simulate price negotiations for the 1,450/1,500 won scenario (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-15). References: Bank of Korea +1, TradingEconomics +1, Wise +1

lastWeek.Title: 원달러 1,463원 하락
lastWeek.Summary: USD/KRW가 전 거래일 약 1,471.5원 수준에서 기준일에 약 1,463.3원까지 0.6% 정도 내려왔어요finance.yahoo​. 환율이 내려가면서 수입 원자재(HRC, 구리, 컴프레서 등) 달러 결제분 비용이 단순 계산으로 약 0.6% 정도 줄어들어서 Q1 원가 부담을 조금 덜어줄 수 있어요. 최근 한 달 동안 원화는 여전히 약 1% 안팎의 약세 흐름이라 중장기 고환율 리스크는 남아 있지만tradingeconomics​, 당장에는 원화 강세 구간을 활용해 달러 결제 비중이 높은 부품 위주로 선결제·장기계약을 검토하면 협력사 단가 인하 여지가 커질 수 있어요. 액션: ① 환율 1,450/1,480/1,500원 3개 시나리오별 수입 원재료비 민감도(환율 1% 변동 시 비용 1% 변동 가정) 재계산 ② 강판·구리·레진 등 달러 결제 비중 상위 20개 협력사 리스트업 및 선결제/환헤지 가능성 검토 ③ 2월 말까지 환율 1,450원 하회 시 선행 발주·장기계약 추진 여부 의사결정안 정리 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-28). 참고: 한국은행+1, YahooFinance+1, TradingEconomics+1
lastWeek.Title_en: The won fell by 1,463 won to the dollar
lastWeek.Summary_en: USD/KRW fell by about 0.6% from the previous trading day's level of about 1,471.5 won to about 1,463.3 won on the base date, finance.yahoo​. With the exchange rate going down, the cost of imported raw materials (HRC, copper, compressors, etc.) settled in dollars will decrease by about 0.6% based on a simple calculation, which will help ease the cost burden in Q1 a little. The Korean won has still been weakening by about 1% for the past month, so there remains a risk of high exchange rate in the medium to long term, but tradingeconomics​, for the time being, if we take advantage of the strong won to review prepayment and long-term contracts for parts with a high proportion of dollar settlement, there may be more room for unit price reductions for partners. Actions: ① Recalculate the sensitivity of imported raw material costs (assuming a 1% change in cost per 1% change in the exchange rate) for three scenarios: KRW 1,450/1,480/1,500. ② List the top 20 suppliers with dollar-denominated payments for steel sheets, copper, resin, etc., and review the possibility of prepayment/foreign exchange rate hedging. ③ Decide whether to pursue advance orders and long-term contracts if the exchange rate falls below KRW 1,450 by the end of February. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-02-28) References: Bank of Korea (+1), YahooFinance (+1), TradingEconomics (+1)

thisMonth.Title: 미국 한국 관세 재부과 협상 중
thisMonth.Summary: 트럼프 대통령이 한국에 25% 상호관세와 자동차 관세를 재부과하겠다고 밝혔어요. 김정관 산업부 장관이 방미해서 협상했지만 아직 해결이 안 됐대요. 미국이 이미 관보 게재 준비까지 한 상태라고 했어요. 동시에 미국 재무부가 한국을 환율 관찰 대상국으로 재지정했어요 (1월 29일). 삼성 관점: 관세 재부과 시 영향이 클 수 있어요. 특히 생활가전 전자부품(반도체 칩, 모터 등)에 쓰는 중간재 수입가가 올라갈 가능성이 있어요. SEHA 냉장고, 세탁기 같은 대미 수출 제품도 미국 내 원가 상승으로 가격 경쟁력이 약화될 수 있어요. 환율 관찰 대상국 지정은 추후 관세 협상의 지렛대로 쓰일 가능성이 높아요. 액션: ① 트럼프 행정부 관세 발표 일정 모니터링 (매주) ② SEHA 대미 수출 제품별 관세 영향도 시뮬레이션 (기한 2월 10일) ③ 관세 25% 부과 시 원가 상승분 계산 (냉장고·세탁기·에어컨 중심, 기한 2월 14일) ④ 협력사 다원화 및 대체 공급처 검토 (기한 3월 1일) (우선순위: 상, 기한 2월 10일). 참고: 동아일보+1, 미국재무부공시+1, 김정관장관발언+1
thisMonth.Title_en: The U.S. and South Korea are negotiating to reimpose tariffs.
thisMonth.Summary_en: President Trump announced that he would reimpose a 25% reciprocal tariff and automobile tariffs on Korea. Trade Minister Kim Jung-kwan visited the US to negotiate, but no resolution has been reached. The US is reportedly preparing to publish the list in the official gazette. At the same time, the US Treasury Department redesignated Korea as a currency monitoring country (January 29th). Samsung's perspective: The reimposition of tariffs could have significant repercussions. In particular, it could increase the import prices of intermediate goods used in home appliance electronic components (semiconductor chips, motors, etc.). US exports, such as SEHA refrigerators and washing machines, could also see their price competitiveness weakened due to rising US costs. The designation as a currency monitoring country is likely to be used as leverage in future tariff negotiations. Actions: ① Monitor the Trump administration's tariff announcement schedule (weekly). ② Simulate the impact of tariffs on SEHA exports to the US by product (deadline: February 10). ③ Calculate the increased cost of a 25% tariff (focusing on refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners, due February 14). ④ Review supplier diversification and alternative suppliers (deadline: March 1). (Priority: High, due February 10). References: Dong-A Ilbo +1, U.S. Treasury Department announcement +1, Minister Kim Jeong-gwan's remarks +1

thisMonth.Title: 한미 관세협상 불확실성 심화, 25% 위협
thisMonth.Summary: 트럼프 대통령이 1월 26일 "한국이 특별법을 입법화하지 않았다"며 관세를 15%에서 25%로 다시 올리겠다고 기습 공표했어요. 작년 7월 협상(상호관세 25%→15%)이 흔들리고 있어요. 이유는 국회가 대미투자특별법 승인을 지연 중이기 때문이에요. 김정관 산업장관이 급히 미국 출장 가서 "투자 의지는 변함없다"고 설득 중인데, 결과는 불확실해요. 삼성 관점: 최악의 경우 관세 10% 추가 인상(15%→25%) → SEHA 자동차 부품·세탁기 모터 등 미국 수출품 원가 급증. 철강·구리 함유도 높은 제품(냉장고, 세탁기) 원가 2~5% 상승 가능. 현재는 15% 유지 가능성이 높지만, 3월 중간선거 전 정치적 압박 가능성 배제 불가. 액션: ① 한미 협상 진전 상황 주간 모니터링 (외교부·산업장관 공개 성명 추적) ② 25% 관세 인상 시 SEHA 제품별 원가 임팩트 정량화 (냉장고, 세탁기, 에어컨 중심) ③ 협력사 가격 협상 기반 구축 (관세 시나리오별 BOM 조정안 작성) (기한 2026-02-20) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-20). 참고: 조선일보+1, SBS+1, MBC+1
thisMonth.Title_en: Uncertainty in Korea-US tariff negotiations deepens, threatening a 25% increase.
thisMonth.Summary_en: On January 26th, President Trump made a surprise announcement that he would raise tariffs from 15% to 25%, claiming that "South Korea has not enacted a special law." The negotiations from July of last year (reciprocal tariffs from 25% to 15%) are faltering because the National Assembly is delaying approval of the Special Act on Investment in the United States. Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy Kim Jeong-gwan is urgently traveling to the United States to reassure the US that "our commitment to investment remains unchanged," but the outcome is uncertain. Samsung's perspective: In the worst-case scenario, an additional 10% tariff increase (from 15% to 25%) would lead to a sharp increase in the cost of US exports, such as SEHA auto parts and washing machine motors. The cost of products with high steel and copper content (refrigerators, washing machines) could rise by 2-5%. While the 15% tariff is likely to remain in place, the possibility of political pressure before the midterm elections in March cannot be ruled out. Actions: ① Weekly monitoring of progress in Korea-US negotiations (tracking public statements from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy); ② Quantifying the cost impact of a 25% tariff increase on each SEHA product (focusing on refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners); ③ Establishing a basis for price negotiations with suppliers (preparing a BOM adjustment plan for each tariff scenario); (Deadline: February 20, 2026) (Priority: High; Deadline: February 20, 2026). References: Chosun Ilbo+1, SBS+1, MBC+1

thisMonth.Title_en: US and China impose 160% tariffs on graphite
thisMonth.Summary_en: The U.S. Department of Commerce has significantly increased the combined tariff and tariff subsidy burden to at least 160% in its final AD/CVD investigation into Chinese graphite for batteries (active anode material).globenewswire+3 Although this measure is limited to Chinese graphite for batteries, if similar trade relief spreads to motors, electronic components, steel, etc., there is a risk that Samsung's DA import cost could gradually increase by up to +1~2% in the mid to long term (based on C). The immediate impact is greater for EVs and ESS, but if the unit price of batteries and modules for cordless vacuum cleaners, robot vacuum cleaners, and premium built-in products that use lithium-ion batteries rises, it could put a burden on the cost of finished products and their price competitiveness. Actions: ① Monitor the final US ITC ruling scheduled for March. ② List BOMs for DA products heavily reliant on Chinese batteries and motors and review alternative supply sources (US, Korea, third countries). ③ Incorporate tariff risks into mid- to long-term battery purchase contracts and hedging strategies for 2026-2027 (Priority: High, Deadline: March 31, 2026). References: StrategicEnergy+1, ESSNews+1, MercomIndia+1

thisMonth.Title: Fed 금리 3.75% 동결
thisMonth.Summary: 연준이 1월 28~29일 FOMC 회의에서 기준금리를 3.50~3.75%로 동결했어요. 작년 9월, 10월, 12월 세 번 연속 인하한 후 처음 멈췄어요. 인플레이션이 여전히 높아서 더 기다리기로 한 거라고 해요. 삼성 관점: Fed의 인상 신호가 약해지면서 달러 약세 가능성이 낮아졌어요. 이러면 원화도 지속적으로 약할 가능성이 커요. 수입 원자재비(철강, 구리, 냉매) 인상 압력이 계속될 거 같아요. 한국은행이 금리 인하를 못 할 수 있어서 한·미 금리차(1.25%p)도 유지될 거고요. 액션: ① Fed 금리 경로 추이 모니터링 (월 1회, 다음 회의 3월 18~19일) ② 협력사별 환율 민감도 재분석 (HRC, 구리 중심, 기한 2월 7일) ③ 환율 1,400/1,450/1,500원 시나리오별 원가 영향도 업데이트 (기한 2월 14일) (우선순위: 중, 기한 2월 7일). 참고: Fed공식발표+1, 조선일보+1, YTN+1
thisMonth.Title_en: Fed rate frozen at 3.75%
thisMonth.Summary_en: The Federal Reserve held its benchmark interest rate steady at 3.50-3.75% at the FOMC meeting on January 28-29. This is the first pause since three consecutive cuts in September, October, and December of last year. They say they decided to wait longer because inflation remains high. Samsung's perspective: With the Fed's signal for a rate hike weakening, the likelihood of a weaker dollar has diminished. This will likely lead to continued weakness in the Korean won. Pressure to increase the cost of imported raw materials (steel, copper, refrigerants) is likely to continue. Since the Bank of Korea may be unable to cut interest rates, the interest rate differential between Korea and the US (1.25 percentage points) will likely remain. Actions: ① Monitor the Fed's interest rate path (monthly, next meeting March 18-19). ② Reanalyze exchange rate sensitivity by partner (HRC, focusing on copper, due February 7). ③ Update cost impacts by exchange rate scenarios of 1,400/1,450/1,500 won (due February 14). (Priority: Medium, due February 7). References: Fed official announcement +1, Chosun Ilbo +1, YTN +1

thisMonth.Summary: Fed가 1월 29일 FOMC에서 기준금리를 3.5~3.75%로 동결했어요. 작년 9월부터 3회 연속 인하했던 사이클이 멈췄어요. 파월 의장은 "중립금리 수준에 부합하고 지켜보기 좋은 위치"라고 했어요. 삼성 관점: 달러가 계속 강한 수준을 유지할 거 같아요. 원화 약세 → 수입 원자재비(구리, HRC, 냉매, 레진 등) 인상 압력 커질 수 있어요. 특히 협력사 가격 협상이 원화 약세 국면에서는 더 어려워질 거 예상돼요. 액션: ① FOMC 금리 향후 전망 모니터링 (파월 의장 5월 교체 후 신임 의장 정책 기조 파악) ② 환율 연동 원가 영향도 재계산 (2월 26일 한국은행 정책회의 전 완료) ③ 달러 강세 대비 환율 1,450/1,500/1,550원 시나리오별 BOM 재분석 (기한 2월 20일) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2월 26일). 참고: Fed공식발표+1, Bloomberg+1
thisMonth.Title_en: The Fed's interest rate remains frozen at 3.75%.
thisMonth.Summary_en: The Fed held its benchmark interest rate steady at 3.5-3.75% at the FOMC meeting on January 29th. This marks the end of the cycle of three consecutive cuts since September of last year. Chairman Powell stated, "It's in line with the neutral rate level and a good position to watch." Samsung's perspective: The dollar is likely to remain strong. A weaker won could increase pressure to raise the cost of imported raw materials (copper, HRC, refrigerants, resins, etc.). Price negotiations with suppliers are expected to become more difficult, particularly with a weak won. Actions: ① Monitor the FOMC interest rate outlook (understand the new chairman's policy direction after Chairman Powell's replacement in May). ② Recalculate the impact of exchange rate-linked costs (to be completed before the Bank of Korea policy meeting on February 26th). ③ Reanalyze the BOM by scenarios of 1,450/1,500/1,550 won against a strong dollar (deadline: February 20th) (Priority: Medium, Deadline: February 26th). lastMonth.Title_en: USD/KRW weakens further to 1,465 won
lastMonth.Summary_en: The Korean won continues to weaken. It rose from 1,443 won in early January to 1,478 won on January 20th and is currently trading in the 1,465 won range, declining approximately 2.4% month-on-month. From Samsung's perspective, this level of weakness will lead to a 2.4% increase in the cost of imported raw materials (steel, copper, refrigerants, etc.). The rising cost of components like SEHA washing machines and refrigerators will make cost negotiations with suppliers difficult. lastMonth.Title_en: Trump raises tariffs on Korean products to 25%
lastMonth.Summary_en: US President Trump announced on social media on the 26th that he would raise tariffs on Korean automobiles, lumber, pharmaceuticals, and other products from 15% to 25%. This is because the July agreement between the US and South Korea (lowering tariffs from 25% to 15%) fell through due to the recent delay in the South Korean National Assembly's ratification of the Special Act on Investment in the US. Samsung's perspective: While the SEHA product line itself has minimal direct impact, concerns about a global economic slowdown are growing. If the trade dispute escalates, the US could also raise tariffs on steel, copper, and chemical components. Currently, the prices of components for Korean suppliers (such as refrigerant tubes and compressors) could rise by an additional 1-2%. However, since Trump has signaled that he will "find a solution with South Korea," there is room for negotiation. If the US Investment Act passes the National Assembly in February, the tariff rate could be reverted from 25% to 15%. Actions: ① Check the date of publication in the USTR Official Gazette (accurately determine the 25% effective date). ② Analyze the tariff impact by partner company (focusing on refrigerants, compressors, and electrical components). ③ Monitor the progress of the Korean National Assembly's legislation (track the passage of the Investment in the United States Act). ④ Develop a trade negotiation strategy (examine the possibility of tariff relief). (Priority: Medium, Deadline: February 10, 2026). References: Chosun Ilbo +1, Dong-A Ilbo +1, KBS News +1

thisWeek.Title_en: Aftermath of the Indian general strike
thisWeek.Summary_en: India saw a nationwide general strike on February 12, 2026, and some regions are experiencing delays in freight transport due to vehicle/manpower issues in ports, logistics, and industrial complexes. thisWeek.Title_en: The aftermath of India's February general strike
thisWeek.Summary_en: India saw a nationwide general strike on February 12, significantly disrupting key services such as power, transportation, and banking for a day. SIEL-P Chennai and SIEL-N Noida factories experienced production disruptions of up to one day due to delays in parts logistics and absenteeism, and repeated strikes of similar scale could impact approximately 3-5% of monthly production. From Samsung's perspective, this strike, involving approximately 300 million workers, has increased the risk of additional general and partial strikes this year, requiring a permanent buffer in production plans and shipping schedules in India. Response: It would be better to increase the local inventory days for core steel/plastic/electronic components in India by 3-5 days compared to the existing ones, and to switch to a structure in which items with the same specifications are operated in parallel with supply lines from Vietnam and Thailand. Actions: ① Collect data on facility utilization and absenteeism during the February general strike with the SIEL-P/SIEL-N local team. ② Raise safety stock targets for key materials and components from India and calculate inventory burden scenarios. ③ Update the list of alternative supply sources between India and Southeast Asia by the first half of 2026 (Priority: High, Deadline: February 20, 2026). References: Indian local media +2, labor organization disclosure +1

thisWeek.Summary_en: In India, a nationwide general strike took place on February 12th, with up to 300 million workers participating, and transportation, finance, and manufacturing came to a standstill for more than a day. SCGE 소주 공장은 로컬 조달이 주이지만, 글로벌로는 중국산 강판·선재 수출 여유가 줄어들면서 한국·베트남·폴란드 공장의 강판 조달비가 평균 +1% 안팎으로 올라갈 수 있어요. 중국발 강재 비중이 높은 법인은 리드타임 지연과 가격 인상을 동시에 대비해서, 일본·한국·인도 등 대체 공급선과 장기계약·‘중국+1’ 포트폴리오를 서둘러 짜야 해요. 액션: ① 중국산 강재·부품 사용 비중 상위 품목 리스트업 ② 2026년 상반기 중국발 선적 리드타임·가격 변동 월간 모니터링 ③ 대체 원산지(일본·한국·인도·동유럽) 견적 비교 및 장기 프레임 계약 타진 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: CRU+1, Mysteel+1, Bloomberg+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: China plans to reintroduce an export licensing system for 245 steel products, including carbon steel and stainless steel, starting in January 2026, requiring permits and quality inspections for each batch. While SCGE's Suzhou plant relies primarily on local procurement, the reduced global availability of Chinese steel plate and wire rod exports could push up steel plate procurement costs for plants in Korea, Vietnam, and Poland by an average of +1%. Companies with a high proportion of Chinese steel should quickly establish long-term contracts and a "China+1" portfolio with alternative suppliers such as Japan, Korea, and India to prepare for both lead time delays and price increases. Actions: ① List the top items using Chinese steel and parts. ② Monitor monthly lead times and price fluctuations for shipments from China in the first half of 2026. ③ Compare quotes from alternative sources (Japan, Korea, India, and Eastern Europe) and explore long-term framework contracts. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-15) References: CRU+1, Mysteel+1, Bloomberg+1

Actions: ① Conduct a full investigation of Mexican partners' country of origin and FTA applicability. ② Prioritize a list of the top 10-20 tariff-affected items. ③ Review USMCA sourcing and joint purchasing (linking with US corporations) options. thisMonth.Title_en: India announces general strike in February
thisMonth.Summary_en:
In India, the Central Trade Union Confederation and various sectoral unions have announced a nationwide strike on February 12th to protest the new labor code, the Shanti Act, pensions, and wages. With banks, power companies, and the public sector joining in, the strike is expected to become quite widespread.

As of recent reports, government agencies, banks, and power companies have announced their intention to participate, which could lead to increased road blockades (rasta roko) and restrictions on factory access in industrial complexes near Noida and Chennai. The SIEL-P/SIEL-N plants face production disruptions of one to two days, and even up to a week, if local steel sheet and parts procurement and workforce attendance are disrupted simultaneously. Therefore, they must proactively develop safety stocks and alternative operations (weekend work) plans for the second week of February.

Response: By early February, it is safest to: ① Confirm the operation plans and inventory levels of major steel and parts suppliers, and ② Prepare a scenario for redistribution (mutual supply supplementation) of finished and semi-finished products from Korea, Vietnam, and Thailand.

Action: ① Discuss countermeasures with the local HR and production teams of SIEL-P/N, including shift operation and commuter buses on the day of the February 12 strike (Deadline: February 8, 2026). ② Increase safety stocks of finished products and key parts for major models to at least one week's worth (Deadline: February 10, 2026). ③ Review production capacity and logistics lead times at factories in Korea, Vietnam, and Thailand in the event of supply disruptions from India (Deadline: February 15, 2026). (Priority: High). References: CTU Joint Statement +1, Newsclick +1, TimesOfIndia +1, citucentre +2

lastMonth.Title_en: India's nationwide strike on February 12 (final confirmation)
lastMonth.Summary_en: The Central Trade Union (CTU) of India officially finalized a strike date for February 12th at its national meeting on January 9th. The strike targets the steel, electricity, and transportation sectors. The strike is protesting the government's formalization of the enforcement regulations for the four major labor laws (enacted in 2020). The union demands: opposition to the abolition of regular employment, strengthening union registration, and a 15% wage increase. More than 70% of steel suppliers for SIEL-P's Chennai and SIEL-N's Noida plants rely on Indian steel, raising concerns about supply disruptions of 2-3 weeks. At the same time, Indian steel prices are expected to rise by 15%, directly impacting refrigerator, washing machine, and air conditioner production. Response: Real-time monitoring of the strike's scale and schedule with local officials. Consultation with steel suppliers on stockpiling plans is also underway. Urgent security of supply lines in Vietnam and Thailand is also expected. Actions: ① Local SIEL-P/N officials will conduct daily strike status checks (deadline: January 23, 2026). ② Re-examination of stockpiling levels by steel partner companies. ③ Initiation of emergency negotiations with Vietnamese and Thai steel companies. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-01-23) References: Indian trade unions +3, news media +2, international organizations +1

thisWeek.Title: LG 인도 현지화 가속
thisWeek.Summary: LG가 인도 예산 2026에서 전자부품 제조 지원 예산을 ₹22,919 crore→₹40,000 crore로 키우면서, 인도 생산 부품 현지화율 55.8%→70%+를 목표로 잡았대요. 인도 법인은 압축기·모터·디스플레이 패널 같은 핵심 부품까지 현지 생산/조달을 늘려 수입 의존도를 줄이고, 환율·물류 리스크를 줄이려는 그림이에요. 동시에 Seoul Economic Daily 분석에 따르면 본사는 인력 효율화에 4,000억 원을 쓰고 연간 1,300~2,000억 원 고정비를 줄이면서, 저코스트 국가 생산·원자재 조달 비중을 키우고 미국 현지 생산 비중을 60%까지 올려 관세 부담도 줄이려 하고 있어요. 인도와 동남아에서 압축기·모터·패널까지 LG가 현지화에 성공하면, 중기적으로 인도·ME/아프리카향 냉장고·세탁기·에어컨에서 삼성의 BOM 단가 경쟁력이 구조적으로 불리해질 수 있어서 조달 구조 재점검이 꽤 시급해 보여요. 삼성 입장에선 같은 인도 시장에서 현지 부품 비중이 낮으면 물류·관세·환율까지 합친 총원가에서 밀리기 쉬워요. 그래서 액션은 이렇게 가면 좋아요: ① LG 인도 법인/현지 협력사 기준 부품(압축기·모터·디스플레이) 공급선 리스트 업데이트 ② 인도·동남아 생산 거점별(폴란드·베트남 포함) 동일 사양 기준 부품 원가 비교 테이블 재작성 ③ 삼성 인도향 생활가전(냉장고·세탁기·에어컨)에서 2026~2027년까지 달성해야 할 현지 조달 비중 목표 세팅 및 협력사 발굴 플랜 수립 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-25). 참고: Multibagg+1, SeoulEconomicDaily+1, ChosunDaily+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: LG has set a target of increasing the budget for supporting electronic component manufacturing in the 2026 Indian Budget from ₹22,919 crore to ₹40,000 crore, and raising the localization rate of parts for Indian production from 55.8% to 70%+. The Indian subsidiary is planning to reduce dependence on imports and reduce exchange rate and logistics risks by increasing local production/sourcing of core components such as compressors, motors, and display panels. At the same time, according to an analysis by Seoul Economic Daily, the headquarters is spending 400 billion won on improving human resources, reducing annual fixed costs by 130-200 billion won, increasing the proportion of production and raw material procurement from low-cost countries, and raising the proportion of local production in the US to 60% to reduce the tariff burden. If LG succeeds in localizing compressors, motors, and panels in India and Southeast Asia, Samsung's BOM unit price competitiveness in refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners for India, ME, and Africa may become structurally disadvantaged in the medium term, so it seems quite urgent to reexamine the procurement structure. From Samsung's perspective, if the proportion of local parts is low in the same Indian market, it is easy to fall behind in the total cost including logistics, tariffs, and exchange rates. So, the actions should go like this: ① Update the list of suppliers for parts (compressors, motors, and displays) based on LG India corporations/local partners ② Re-create the cost comparison table for parts based on the same specifications by production base in India and Southeast Asia (including Poland and Vietnam) ③ Set the target for the proportion of local procurement to be achieved by 2026-2027 for Samsung's home appliances for India (refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners) and establish a plan to discover partners (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-25). Reference: Multibagg+1, SeoulEconomicDaily+1, ChosunDaily+1
