thisWeek.Title: Whirlpool 원가절감
thisWeek.Summary: Whirlpool이 2025년 한 해에 구조적 비용 절감 2억달러를 실행하고도 관세 부담 속에서 연간 EBIT 마진 4.7%를 유지했다고 실적 발표와 컨퍼런스콜에서 밝혔어요. 하지만 2025년 한 해에만 부품·완제품에 걸쳐 관세 비용 약 3억달러를 흡수했고, 2026년에 추가 1억5,000만달러+ 규모의 비용 절감 액션을 북미 중심으로 더 추진하겠다고 해서, 북미 생산·소싱 쪽 체질 개선을 계속 드라이브하는 그림이에요. 관세·프로모션 압박이 큰데도 Whirlpool이 고정비·소싱 구조를 공격적으로 재편하고 있어서, 북미 세탁기·건조기·냉장고 시장에서 단순 가격 인상만으로는 삼성의 원가 우위를 방어하기가 점점 어려워질 수 있어요. 삼성 관점에선 북미 MDA(세탁기·건조기·냉장고) 기준으로 Whirlpool의 COGS/매출 구조와 재료비·관세 항목을 라인별로 뜯어보지 않으면, 향후 1~2년간 ASP 인하 싸움에서 뒤늦게 대응하게 될 위험이 있어요. 그래서 액션은 ① Whirlpool 2025년 IR·Press Release·10-K에서 제품군별 매출원가(COGS)·관세 영향 수치 정리 ② 북미 세탁기·건조기 기준 Whirlpool vs 삼성의 재료비/제조경비 구조 비교 테이블 작성 ③ 2026~2027년 북미 주요 철강·플라스틱·전자부품 공급사별 재료비 인하·리베이트 목표 세팅 및 LTA 개편안 초안 수립 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-28). 참고: WhirlpoolIR+1, FintoolTranscript+1, Ainvest+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Whirlpool announced in its earnings release and conference call that it would maintain an annual 4.7% EBIT margin despite implementing structural cost savings of $200 million in 2025 alone and the burden of tariffs. However, in 2025 alone, it absorbed approximately $300 million in tariff costs across parts and finished products, and announced that it would pursue additional $150 million+ cost-saving actions in 2026, centered on North America, indicating that it is continuing to drive structural improvements in North American production and sourcing. Despite the significant pressure from tariffs and promotions, Whirlpool is aggressively restructuring its fixed costs and sourcing structure, making it increasingly difficult for Samsung to defend its cost advantage in the North American washer, dryer, and refrigerator market simply by raising prices. From Samsung's perspective, if it doesn't analyze Whirlpool's COGS/sales structure and material costs/tariff items by line based on the North American MDA (washer, dryer, and refrigerator), there is a risk that it will respond late in the fight to lower ASPs over the next 1-2 years. Therefore, the actions are as follows: ① Compile cost of goods sold (COGS) and tariff impact figures by product group from Whirlpool's 2025 IR, Press Release, and 10-K; ② Create a table comparing the material cost/manufacturing overhead structure of Whirlpool vs. Samsung for North American washers and dryers; and ③ Set material cost reduction and rebate targets for major North American steel, plastic, and electronic component suppliers for 2026-2027 and draft a LTA reform plan. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-28) References: WhirlpoolIR+1, FintoolTranscript+1, Ainvest+1

thisWeek.Title: Gree 구리비용 압박
thisWeek.Summary: Gree가 구리 가격이 톤당 10만위안 수준까지 오른 상황에서도 에어컨 소비자 가격을 올리지 않고, 에어컨 원가의 약 40%를 차지하는 구리 배관·열교환기를 그대로 쓰겠다고 밝힌 뉴스가 나왔어요. 중국 내 다른 에어컨 업체들은 구리 급등 때문에 가격을 2~5% 올리고, 알루미늄 열교환기를 써서 최대 20% 저렴한 알루미늄 에어컨도 내놓는 흐름인데, Gree는 브랜드·신뢰성 이미지를 위해 알루미늄 전환을 서두르지 않겠다는 스탠스를 유지하고 있어요. 기사에 따르면 구리 가격이 톤당 10만위안, 알루미늄은 2만2,000위안 수준이고 필요한 중량도 알루미늄이 구리의 60% 정도라 이론상 원가 절감 여지는 크지만, 수명·신뢰성 이슈 때문에 업계가 속도를 조절하는 분위기래요. 구리 가격이 이렇게 오른 상태가 길어지면 삼성도 압축기·열교환기용 구리 소재 조달 단가가 같이 오르기 때문에, 어느 수준까지 알루미늄·복합소재를 쓸지 기술·원가 시나리오를 서둘러 그려두는 게 필수인 타이밍이에요. 삼성 입장에서는 중국·글로벌 구리 가격이 계속 고공행진하면 냉장고·에어컨·히트펌프 쪽 재료비 비중이 더 튀어 오를 수 있어요. 그래서 액션은 ① 광주·천안·중국 생산법인의 구리 사용량/원가 민감도(톤당 가격 변화 대비 제품 원가 영향) 재산정 ② 알루미늄 열교환기·튜브 적용 시 성능·수명 영향에 대한 사내·협력사 시험 데이터 리뷰 및 적용 가능한 제품군 선별 ③ 2026년 구리/알루미늄 LTA(장기계약) 전략 및 가격 헤지 정책(선물·옵션 포함) 초안 수립 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: Yicai+1, Longbridge+1, NextGenInvestors+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Gree announced that it will not raise the consumer price of its air conditioners even as the price of copper soars to 100,000 yuan per ton, and will continue to use copper piping and heat exchangers, which account for about 40% of the air conditioner cost, according to news reports. Other air conditioner companies in China are raising their prices by 2-5% due to the surge in copper and releasing aluminum air conditioners that are up to 20% cheaper by using aluminum heat exchangers, but Gree is maintaining its stance of not rushing to switch to aluminum for the sake of its brand and reliability image. According to the article, the price of copper is 100,000 yuan per ton, aluminum is around 22,000 yuan, and aluminum requires about 60% of the weight of copper, so in theory there is a lot of room for cost reduction, but the industry is said to be slowing down due to lifespan and reliability issues. If the rise in copper prices continues like this, Samsung's unit cost of procuring copper materials for compressors and heat exchangers will also increase, so it is essential to quickly draw up a technology and cost scenario for how much aluminum and composite materials to use. From Samsung's perspective, if Chinese and global copper prices continue to soar, the proportion of material costs for refrigerators, air conditioners, and heat pumps may jump further. Therefore, the actions are ① re-evaluate the copper usage/cost sensitivity (product cost impact compared to price change per ton) of the Gwangju, Cheonan, and Chinese production corporations ② Review in-house and partner test data on the impact on performance and lifespan when applying aluminum heat exchangers and tubes and select applicable product groups ③ Draft a copper/aluminum LTA (long-term agreement) strategy and price hedging policy (including futures and options) for 2026 (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-15). References: Yicai+1, Longbridge+1, NextGenInvestors+1

thisWeek.Title: Whirlpool 원가 마진 4.7%→5.5% 가이던스
thisWeek.Summary: Whirlpool이 2025년 풀이어 원가 마진(ongoing EBIT margin) 4.7% 달성 후 2026년 5.5-5.8%로 80-110bp 개선 가이던스 발표했어요. 관세·인플레 환경에서도 신제품 런칭과 가격 조정, 구조적 비용 절감 $200M 달성으로 이뤘다고 해요. Whirlpool 마진 확대가 지속되면 냉장고·세탁기 시장에서 프로모션 여력 커져 삼성 미국향 가격 경쟁 압박이 연간 30-50억 원 규모로 커질 수 있어요. 벤치마크: Whirlpool처럼 북미 생산 비중 높이고 강판 등 원자재 국내 조달 강화 필요. 액션: ① Whirlpool 10-K 원가 구조 상세 분석(강판 조달 96%, 생산 80%) ② SEDAM 북미 냉장고·세탁기 BOM 원가율 비교 ③ 미국향 강판 공급사 가격 락인 협상 시작 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-28) 참고: Whirlpool10K+1, Reuters+1investing+1
thisWeek.Title_en: Whirlpool's cost margin guidance increased from 4.7% to 5.5%.
thisWeek.Summary_en: Whirlpool announced guidance for an 80-110bp improvement in its ongoing EBIT margin to 5.5-5.8% in 2026 after achieving 4.7% in 2025. The company said it achieved this by launching new products, adjusting prices, and achieving $200 million in structural cost savings, despite the tariff and inflation environment. If Whirlpool's margin expansion continues, its promotional power in the refrigerator and washing machine market will increase, and the price competition pressure on Samsung in the US could grow to 3-5 billion won per year. Benchmark: Like Whirlpool, it is necessary to increase the proportion of production in North America and strengthen domestic procurement of raw materials such as steel plates. Actions: ① Detailed analysis of Whirlpool 10-K cost structure (96% steel sheet procurement, 80% production) ② Comparison of SEDAM North American refrigerator and washing machine BOM cost ratios ③ Price lock-in negotiations with U.S. steel sheet suppliers begin (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-28) References: Whirlpool10K+1, Reuters+1, investing+1

thisWeek.Title: LG Pro Builder 확대
thisWeek.Summary: LG가 KBIS 2026에서 북미 빌더 전용 프로그램인 LG Pro Builder 포트폴리오에 LG SIGNATURE Seamless/Iconic/Tailored 3개 컬렉션을 추가해서, 빌더가 엔트리~럭셔리까지 한 브랜드 안에서 패키지로 선택할 수 있게 만들었어요. 이 말은 주방·런드리 설계 단계에서부터 LG 제품이 기본값으로 깔릴 확률이 커진다는 거라, 삼성 입장에선 같은 현장에 들어가기 위해 추가 리베이트·프로모션을 써야 할 위험이 있어요. 빌더 채널에서 LG가 프리미엄 패키지와 HVAC·히트펌프 온수기까지 한 번에 공급하면, 우리 쪽 냉장고·세탁기만 따로 스펙 인 시키기가 점점 어려워질 수 있어요. 액션: ① 북미 빌더 상위 20개사 기준 현행 삼성 vs LG 납품 비중 재점검 ② Dacor/삼성 빌더 프로그램에 에어컨·히트펌프 온수기까지 번들할 수 있는지 사업부 공통 TF 검토 ③ 2026~2027년 착공 예정 대형 프로젝트 중심으로 빌더 패키지 견적 개발 및 원가·리베이트 한도 설정 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: LG Pro Builder보도자료+3
thisWeek.Summary_en: LG added three collections, LG SIGNATURE Seamless/Iconic/Tailored, to its LG Pro Builder portfolio, a program exclusive to North American builders, at KBIS 2026, allowing builders to choose from a package ranging from entry-level to luxury within one brand. This means that LG products are more likely to be installed as defaults during the kitchen and laundry design stage, which means Samsung may have to use additional rebates and promotions to enter the same field. If LG supplies premium packages and HVAC/heat pump water heaters all at once through the builder channel, it may become increasingly difficult to separately specify our refrigerators and washing machines. Actions: ① Re-examine the current Samsung vs. LG supply ratios among the top 20 North American builders. ② Review the possibility of bundling air conditioners and heat pump water heaters with the Dacor/Samsung builder program through a joint task force across business divisions. ③ Develop builder package estimates and set cost and rebate limits, focusing on large projects scheduled to commence construction in 2026-2027 (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-03-15). Reference: LG Pro Builder Press Release+3

lastWeek.Title: Whirlpool 구조적 비용절감
lastWeek.Summary: Whirlpool이 2023년에만 약 8억 달러 비용을 줄였고, 2024~2026년에도 제조·공급망 쪽에서 연간 1~2억 달러씩 추가 절감을 이어가겠다고 하면서 부품 SKU를 11만 개에서 5만 개 이하로 줄이는 전략을 밀고 있어요.이렇게 구조적으로 마진을 0.8~1.1%p 더 끌어올리겠다는 계획이라, 같은 철강·모터·압축기 벤더를 두고 삼성보다 더 유리한 단가·조건을 선점할 가능성이 커지고 있어요. 우리 기준으로 같은 매출 규모에서 마진 격차 1%p는 연간 수천억 원 차이라 Whirlpool식 플랫폼·모듈 표준화를 벤치마킹하지 않으면 중장기 원가 경쟁에서 밀릴 수 있어요. 액션: ① 세탁기/냉장고/건조기 Top 20 공통 모듈 리스트업 후 SKU 축소 타깃 정의 ② 글로벌 철강·모터·압축기 벤더와 LME/CRU 연동+Gain Sharing 구조 LTA 초안 마련 ③ 북미 공장(미국/멕시코) 자동화 투자 로드맵 초안 수립 및 주요 설비 벤더 다년 계약 검토 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: SupplyChainDive+1, Whirlpool실적/콜요약+2
lastWeek.Summary_en: Whirlpool is pushing a strategy to reduce the number of parts SKUs from 110,000 to less than 50,000, saying that it reduced costs by about $800 million in 2023 alone and will continue to reduce an additional $100 to $200 million annually in manufacturing and supply chain from 2024 to 2026. With this plan to structurally increase margins by 0.8 to 1.1 percentage points, the possibility of securing more favorable unit prices and conditions than Samsung among steel, motor, and compressor vendors is increasing. By our standards, a 1 percentage point margin gap in the same sales volume is worth hundreds of billions of won per year, so if we do not benchmark Whirlpool's platform and module standardization, we may fall behind in the mid- to long-term cost competition. Actions: ① List the top 20 common modules for washing machines, refrigerators, and dryers and define SKU reduction targets. ② Draft an LTA (Long-Term Agreement) with global steel, motor, and compressor vendors, including LME/CRU integration and gain-sharing structure. ③ Draft an automation investment roadmap for North American plants (US/Mexico) and review multi-year contracts with key equipment vendors. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-15) References: SupplyChainDive+1, Whirlpool Performance/Call Summary+2

lastWeek.Title: Whirlpool 공급망 비용 1-2억불 절감
lastWeek.Summary: Whirlpool CFO가 2024년 제조·공급망에서 1~2억 달러 추가 절감 달성했다고 밝혔어요. 전체 3~4억 달러 목표로 부품 표준화·조달 최적화 추진 중이에요. 원자재 계약 덕에 EBIT 영향 거의 없다고 하니 삼성도 장기 계약 확대가 필수예요. 삼성 관점: Whirlpool의 부품 축소 전략은 철강·모터 단가 하락과 재고비 절감으로 이어져 연간 수십억 원 규모 경쟁 격차 생길 수 있어요. 액션: ① Whirlpool BOM 표준화 벤치마크 ② 삼성 Top20 부품 패밀리 표준화 로드맵 ③ 장기 원자재 계약 커버리지 점검 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-20). 참고: SupplyChainDive+1
lastWeek.Title_en: Whirlpool to reduce supply chain costs by $100-200 million
lastWeek.Summary_en: Whirlpool's CFO announced that it has achieved an additional $100-200 million in manufacturing and supply chain savings by 2024. The company is currently pursuing component standardization and procurement optimization, aiming for a total of $300-400 million. Samsung also needs to expand long-term contracts, as raw material contracts have minimal impact on EBIT. Samsung's perspective: Whirlpool's component reduction strategy could lead to lower steel and motor unit prices and inventory savings, potentially creating a competitive gap worth tens of billions of won annually. Actions: ① Whirlpool BOM standardization benchmark ② Samsung's Top 20 component family standardization roadmap ③ Long-term raw material contract coverage review (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-20). Reference: SupplyChainDive+1

lastWeek.Title: LG HS 생산 Footprint 최적화
lastWeek.Summary: LG HS 사업이 2025년 매출 26조 원대 사상 최대 실적 냈어요. 미국 관세에도 생산 Footprint·비용 개선으로 영업이익 방어했다고 해요. LG의 지역 최적화가 성공적이라 삼성도 미주·EU 공장 재배치와 현지 조달 비중을 높여야 해요. 삼성 관점: LG HS 원가율 우위 지속 시 냉장고·세탁기 BOM 기준 연 30~50억 원 격차 날 수 있어요. 액션: ① LG HS 실적 원가 비중 분석 ② 지역별 BOM TCO 비교 ③ 현지 공급선 후보 리스트업 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-25). 참고: LG실적공시+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: LG's HS business achieved record-breaking performance, reaching KRW 26 trillion in sales in 2025. Despite US tariffs, the company said it defended its operating profit by improving its production footprint and costs. Given LG's successful regional optimization, Samsung should also relocate its plants in the Americas and the EU and increase its local procurement. Samsung's perspective: If LG HS maintains its cost ratio advantage, the annual gap in refrigerator and washing machine BOMs could reach KRW 3-5 billion. Actions: ① Analyze LG HS performance cost ratios, ② Compare BOM TCO by region, and ③ List local supplier candidates (Priority: High, Deadline: February 25, 2026). Reference: LG Performance Disclosure +1

lastWeek.Title: LGHS원가개선
lastWeek.Summary: LG전자가 2025년 연간 실적에서 매출 89.2조원, 영업이익 2.48조원 공시했어요. 특히 HS(생활가전)는 매출 26.13조원, 영업이익 1.28조원이고, 생산거점 최적화·가격조정·원가개선으로 미국 관세 비용압력 대응했다고 했어요. (신뢰도: 높음, LG보도자료+2,Reuters+1) LG가 관세 압력 상황에서도 HS 수익을 방어하면, 북미 시장에서 “가격 방어+프로모션 운영” 경쟁이 더 타이트해질 수 있어요. 추정(가정: 판재/수지/구리 등 원재료 5%↑, 총원가 +2.5~3.5% 범위) 기준으로, 삼성도 프리미엄 믹스+거점 운영 최적화가 협상 지렛대가 돼요. 벤치마크: 풋프린트 최적화(멕시코/미국/베트남 스윙) + D2C/구독 기반 가격 탄력성 확보 흐름을 같이 봐야 해요. 액션: ① [정보 확인] LG HS 세부 원가/관세 영향 언급(컨콜/자료) 포인트 정리 ② [전략 수립] 삼성 DA 북미향 SKU별 생산거점 재배치 시나리오(멕시코↔미국↔베트남) 원가 비교 ③ [협상 시작] 핵심 부품(모터/PCB/컴프) 공급사에 “관세분담/가격연동” 조건 제시 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-14). 참고: LG보도자료+2,Reuters+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: LG Electronics announced its 2025 annual earnings, reporting sales of KRW 89.2 trillion and operating profit of KRW 2.48 trillion. Notably, its Home Appliances (HS) division achieved sales of KRW 26.13 trillion and operating profit of KRW 1.28 trillion, and the company stated that it responded to US tariff cost pressures by optimizing production bases, adjusting prices, and improving costs. (Reliability: High, LG Press Release +2, Reuters +1) If LG defends HS revenue despite the tariff pressure, competition in the North American market could intensify between "price defense and promotional operations." Based on estimates (assuming a 5% increase in raw materials such as sheet metal, resin, and copper, and a 2.5-3.5% increase in total costs), Samsung's premium mix and optimized base operations provide leverage for negotiations. Benchmark: Footprint Optimization (Mexico/US/Vietnam Swing) + Securing Price Elasticity Based on D2C/Subscription Must Be Viewed Together. Action: ① [Information Confirmation] Summary of Key Points from LG HS's Detailed Cost/Tariff Impact Statement (Concall/Data) ② [Strategy Development] Cost Comparison of Samsung DA's North American SKU-Specific Production Base Relocation Scenario (Mexico ↔ US ↔ Vietnam) ③ [Start Negotiations] Present "Tariff Sharing/Price Linkage" Conditions to Suppliers of Core Components (Motors/PCBs/Comps) (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-14). Reference: LG Press Release +2, Reuters +1

lastWeek.Title: Haier헤징가격조정
lastWeek.Summary: Haier Smart Home이 2024 연간 실적에서 매출 285,971 RMBm, 매출원가(Cost of sales) 208,128 RMBm을 공시했어요. 리스크 섹션에서 철강·알루미늄·구리·플라스틱 등 원자재 가격 상승 압력을 명시했고, 대응으로 volume & price adjustment mechanism과 hedging를 언급했어요. (신뢰도: 높음, HKEX공시+1,Haier공식+1,Haier보고서+1) Haier가 가격조정+헤징을 “공식 리스크 대응 체계”로 못 박으면, 원재료 변동 국면에서 경쟁사 가격 전가 속도가 빨라질 수 있어요. 또 공급망 통합 강화로 공동 컴프레서 공장 224만대, PCB 530만대 생산도 언급했어서(수직계열화), 핵심부품 경쟁이 더 세질 수 있어요. 벤치마크: 컴프/PCB는 “내재화+멀티소싱+가격연동” 3단 조합이 비용/리스크 균형 좋아 보여요. 액션: ① [정보 확인] Haier 공시 내 원자재 리스크 원문(페이지/문장) 구매팀 공유 ② [전략 수립] 삼성 DA도 냉장고·에어컨 컴프·PCB 내재/외주 믹스별 원가·리스크 매트릭스 작성 ③ [협상 시작] 원자재 연동(철강/동/수지) 조건에 “가격조정 트리거(지수/기간)”를 계약에 표준화 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-14). 참고: HKEX공시+1,Haier공식+1,Haier보고서+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: Haier Smart Home reported revenue of 285,971 RMBm and cost of sales of 208,128 RMBm in its 2024 annual results. In the risk section, the company cited rising raw material price pressures, including steel, aluminum, copper, and plastic, and mentioned the volume & price adjustment mechanism and hedging as responses. (Reliability: High, HKEX disclosure + 1, Haier official + 1, Haier report + 1) If Haier solidifies price adjustments and hedging as its "official risk response system," it could accelerate the rate of price transfer to competitors in the event of raw material fluctuations. Furthermore, with the company mentioning strengthened supply chain integration, including the production of 2.24 million compressors and 5.3 million PCBs at a joint plant (vertical integration), competition for core components could intensify. Benchmark: For compressors and PCBs, a three-step combination of "internalization + multisourcing + price linkage" appears to offer a good cost/risk balance. Actions: ① [Information Confirmation] Share the original text (page/sentence) of Haier's raw material risk disclosure with the purchasing team. ② [Strategy Development] Samsung DA also creates a cost/risk matrix for refrigerators and air conditioners computers and PCBs by internal/outsourced mix. ③ [Start Negotiations] Standardize the "price adjustment trigger (index/period)" in the raw material linkage (steel/copper/resin) condition in the contract (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-14). References: HKEX disclosure +1, Haier official +1, Haier report +1

thisMonth.Title: GE Appliances 미국 공급선 확대 1.5억 달러
thisMonth.Summary: GE Appliances(Haier 자회사)가 2025년 11월 미국 공급업체에 1.5억 달러 이상의 신규 계약을 체결했어요. 10개 주 22개 공급사(U.S. Steel 포함)와 세탁기·냉장고 부품 공급 계약을 맺었거든요. 국내 공급업체 지출도 3.3% 증가했어요. 더 큰 그림은 5년 3억 달러 투자로 중국→미국 생산 전환(냉장고, 가스레인지, 온수기)을 가속화하는 거예요. 자동화·로봇화(AMR)로 "Zero Distance" 전략을 추진 중이에요. 삼성 관점: GE의 미국 리쇼어링은 북미 시장 경쟁 강도를 높일 예정이에요 → 납기, 원가 경쟁력 악화 우려. 반면 중국 공급사 의존도 감소 신호이므로, 삼성의 베트남·태국 공급사 비중 확대 기회가 생겨요. 액션: ① GE 미국 공급사 리스트 추적(철강, 플라스틱 업체) ② 삼성 베트남/태국 협력사 생산 용량 확인 ③ 북미 경쟁사 원가 분석 및 삼성 기가팩토리 전략 재검토(기한 2026-03-03) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-21). 참고: AP통신+2, GE Appliances보도자료+1
thisMonth.Title_en: GE Appliances expands its US supply chain for $150 million
thisMonth.Summary_en: GE Appliances (a Haier subsidiary) signed new contracts worth over $150 million with U.S. suppliers in November 2025. The contracts cover washing machine and refrigerator parts with 22 suppliers (including U.S. Steel) across 10 states. Domestic supplier spending also increased by 3.3%. The bigger picture is accelerating the shift from China to the U.S. for production (refrigerators, gas ranges, and water heaters) with a $300 million investment over five years. The company is pursuing a "Zero Distance" strategy through automation and robotization (AMR). From Samsung's perspective, GE's reshoring to the U.S. is expected to intensify competition in the North American market, raising concerns about deteriorating delivery and cost competitiveness. However, this signals a decrease in reliance on Chinese suppliers, creating opportunities for Samsung to increase its presence in Vietnamese and Thai suppliers. Actions: ① Track GE's US supplier list (steel and plastics companies); ② Verify production capacity of Samsung's Vietnam/Thailand partners; ③ Analyze cost estimates of North American competitors and review Samsung's Gigafactory strategy (Due March 3, 2026) (Priority: High; Deadline: February 21, 2026). References: AP+2, GE Appliances press release+1

thisMonth.Title: Haier 냉매 가격 인상 공식화 +18~20%
thisMonth.Summary: Haier가 냉매 R454B 규제 강화에 따른 가격 인상을 공식 성명으로 발표했어요. 2026년 2월부터 모든 에어컨·냉장고 모델에 +18~20% 가격을 반영하기로 했거든요. 규제 변화에 선제적으로 대응하는 모습이에요. 여타 경쟁사도 비슷한 비용 부담을 안고 있을 거예요. 삼성 관점: Haier의 가격 인상이 시장 수용성 테스트가 돼요 → 성공하면 삼성도 소비자 가격 인상 정당성 확보 가능. 하지만 저항이 크면 삼성도 원가 절감으로 버티야 할 상황이 올 수 있어요. 냉매 공급사와의 단가 재협상이 시급해요. 액션: ① Haier 가격 인상 시장 반응 모니터링(판매량 변동) ② 삼성 냉매 공급사(한국냉매, 덴포스 등) 가격 협상 준비 ③ 대체 냉매(R32, R290) 모델 확대 로드맵 수립 및 소비자 커뮤니케이션 전략 수립(기한 2026-02-28) (우선순위: 상, 기한 2026-02-10). 참고: Haier공식성명+1, 중국경제매체+2
thisMonth.Title_en: Haier refrigerant price hike officially announced +18-20%
thisMonth.Summary_en: Haier has officially announced a price increase due to tightening regulations for refrigerant R454B. Starting in February 2026, all air conditioner and refrigerator models will be subject to an 18-20% price increase. This is a proactive response to regulatory changes. Other competitors are likely facing similar cost burdens. Samsung's perspective: Haier's price increase will be a test of market acceptance. If successful, Samsung will be able to justify raising consumer prices. However, if resistance is strong, Samsung may be forced to cut costs. Urgent price renegotiation with refrigerant suppliers is crucial. Actions: ① Monitor market reactions to Haier's price increase (sales volume fluctuations), ② Prepare for price negotiations with Samsung's refrigerant suppliers (Korea Refrigerant, Denfoss, etc.), and ③ Develop a roadmap for expanding alternative refrigerant (R32, R290) models and a consumer communication strategy (Deadline: February 28, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: February 10, 2026). Reference: Haier official statement +1, Chinese economic media +2

thisMonth.Title: Whirlpool 미국 관세 $300M 비용
thisMonth.Summary: Whirlpool이 2026년 구조적 과제 공식 공표했어요. 미국 50% 강철·알루미늄 관세(6월 23일 발효)로 $300M+ 비용 증가 예정이에요. 추가로 주택 시장 부진으로 기본 가전 수요도 약해지고 있어요. 작년 Q4 매출 41억 달러, EPS 75.9% 급락 수준으로 부진했어요. 삼성 관점: Whirlpool의 관세 타격은 역설적으로 삼성의 기회 창출해요. Whirlpool이 생산·조달 최적화로 한 3개월 마진 회복에 집중하는 동안, 삼성은 베트남·멕시코 공급선 다변화로 공급 우위 확보 가능. 특히 북미 냉장고·세탁기 납기에서 시장 점유 기회 있어요. 반면 전체 시장 마진 악화로 가격 경쟁 심화 우려. 액션: ① Whirlpool 2026년 가이던스 상세 분석 ② 삼성의 공급 우위 정량화(납기, 비용) ③ 북미 거래선 공급 계약 갱신 준비 (기한 2026-02-20) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-15). 참고: Bloomberg+1, Whirlpool실적공시+1
thisMonth.Title_en: Whirlpool's US tariffs cost it $300 million
thisMonth.Summary_en: Whirlpool has officially announced its structural challenges for 2026. The 50% US tariffs on steel and aluminum (effective June 23rd) are expected to increase costs by over $300 million. Furthermore, the sluggish housing market is weakening demand for basic appliances. Last year, Q4 sales were $4.1 billion, and EPS plummeted 75.9%. From Samsung's perspective, the impact of Whirlpool's tariffs paradoxically creates opportunities for Samsung. While Whirlpool focuses on recovering margins for the next three months by optimizing production and procurement, Samsung can secure a supply advantage by diversifying its supply chains in Vietnam and Mexico. This presents a particular opportunity to gain market share in North American refrigerator and washing machine delivery. However, deteriorating overall market margins raise concerns about intensifying price competition. Actions: ① Detailed analysis of Whirlpool's 2026 guidance; ② Quantification of Samsung's supply advantage (delivery time, cost); ③ Preparation for renewal of supply contract with North American suppliers (due February 20, 2026); (Priority: High; Due February 15, 2026). References: Bloomberg +1, Whirlpool earnings release +1
thisMonth.Tag_en: Whirlpool, tariff, supply chain, Competitive opportunities, North America

thisMonth.Title: 원재료(구리·알루미늄) 가격 폭등
thisMonth.Summary: 2026년 초 기준, 구리 +42%, 알루미늄 +19% 급등했어요(최근 1년). LME 기준 구리는 고점 치고 있고, 알루미늄도 2,600달러 수준에서 등락 중. 냉연도금재도 1월 이후 톤당 5만원 연이어 인상(국내). 주요 원인은 미국 관세 확대, 중국 부동산 경기 회복, 러-우 전쟁 장기화 예상. 삼성 DA 제품별 영향 시뮬레이션: ① 에어컨(구리 고집약 제품): 구리 30% 상승 시 출고가 5% 인상 필요 ② 냉장고(강철·알루미늄): 양 원재료 동시 상승으로 연간 약 50~100억 원 비용 증가 ③ 세탁기(모터 압축기): 공급 제약 가능성 증가. 삼성 관점: 경쟁사들도 동일한 원가 압박 받고 있어요. Midea 1월 6% 가격 인상, Panasonic 4월부터 가격 인상 예정. 따라서 삼성도 시장 가격선 상향 기회 있으나, 소비자 저항 우려로 신중해야 해요. 액션: ① 광주·SEDAM·SEHAM 협력사와 원재료 원가 인상분 협상(목표 반영율: 70~80%) ② 대체 소재 R&D 가속(알루미늄 → 플라스틱 또는 강철 → 복합재료) ③ 소비자 가격 인상 시나리오 분석(3~5% 범위 내 수용성 평가) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-09). 참고: 위드톡분석+1, 경제매체+1
thisMonth.Title_en: Raw material (copper and aluminum) prices skyrocket
thisMonth.Summary_en: As of early 2026, copper prices have surged 42% and aluminum prices have surged 19% (over the past year). LME copper prices are at a high, and aluminum is fluctuating around $2,600. Cold-rolled galvanized steel prices have also been rising by 50,000 won per ton since January (domestic). The main reasons are the expansion of US tariffs, the recovery of the Chinese real estate market, and the expected prolongation of the Russo-Russian War. Samsung DA simulates the impact on each product: ① Air conditioners (copper-intensive products): A 30% rise in copper prices requires a 5% increase in ex-factory prices. ② Refrigerators (steel and aluminum): Simultaneous increases in both raw materials could lead to an annual cost increase of approximately 5-10 billion won. ③ Washing machines (motor compressors): The possibility of supply constraints is increasing. Samsung's perspective: Competitors are also facing similar cost pressures. Midea raised prices by 6% in January, and Panasonic plans to raise prices starting in April. Therefore, Samsung also has an opportunity to raise its market price, but caution is advised due to concerns about consumer resistance. Actions: ① Negotiate raw material cost increases with Gwangju, SEDAM, and SEHAM partners (target reflection rate: 70-80%), ② Accelerate R&D on alternative materials (aluminum → plastic or steel → composites), and ③ Analyze consumer price increase scenarios (evaluate acceptability within the 3-5% range). (Priority: High, Deadline: February 9, 2026). References: WithTalk Analysis +1, Economic Media +1

lastMonth.Title: Haier 냉매 공급망 리스크 심화

lastMonth.Title_en: Haier's refrigerant supply chain risks deepen.
lastMonth.Summary_en: Haier has officially announced a refrigerant supply shortage due to the tightened R454B regulations (Kigali Protocol). Due to the Chinese government's HFC production quota system (implemented in 2024), major Chinese manufacturers exhausted their quotas in January 2025, leading to a sharp rise in refrigerant prices despite the off-season. The hydrofluoric acid market is expected to remain a high-price market in 2026. From Samsung's perspective, Haier's refrigerant supply disruptions are likely to lead to a higher overall market price increase, providing Samsung with an opportunity to justify its consumer price hikes. However, if the market accepts the price increase poorly, Samsung will likely have to rely on cost reductions to sustain its efforts. The Korean market, which is heavily reliant on Chinese refrigerants, is particularly vulnerable, requiring an accelerated transition to R290 alternatives. Furthermore, Haier's opening of a new US$400 million air conditioner plant in Thailand is expected to intensify competition for refrigerant supply in Southeast Asia. Actions: ① Review price negotiation strategies with Gwangju and SEHC refrigerant suppliers (Honeywell, Chemours, and local Chinese suppliers). ② Establish a roadmap to expand alternative refrigerant models for R290 and R32 (by March 31, 2026). ③ Review diversification of refrigerant suppliers in Vietnam and Thailand (by February 28, 2026). (Priority: High, by January 24, 2026). References: Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Journal +1, China Market Analysis +2, Cooling Post +1

thisWeek.Title: 냉매 R454B 규제
thisWeek.Summary: EU F-Gas 규제 강화로 R454B·R32 같은 저 GWP 냉매 수요가 늘면서 R454B 시장가격이 최근 몇 년간 +18~20% 가량 오른 구간이에요.minisplitsforless+1 미국·EU에서 R410A 신규 사용을 단계적으로 막고 있어 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨 냉매 비용이 앞으로도 구조적으로 높아질 가능성이 커요.linkedin+1 R454B가 R32 대비 파운드당 +20~25% 비싼 프리미엄을 유지하고 있어서, 광주·SEHC 에어컨에서 R454B 전환 비중이 커질수록 한 대당 냉매 BOM이 대략 +0.2~0.3%p 추가로 오를 수 있어요. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 7~9월 성수기 R454B/R32 소요량 6~9개월분 장기계약(상한 +10~15% 캡) 체결 ② R454B 전환 모델은 고효율·저 GWP 프리미엄을 판매 가격·마케팅 메시지에 반영해 원가 전가 ③ 중장기적으로 R32/R290 대체 설계 확대 및 냉매 충전량 절감 설계 R&D 협의(우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: EU공식+1, JohnsonControls+1, HVAC시장리포트+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: As the demand for low-GWP refrigerants such as R454B and R32 has increased due to the strengthening of EU F-Gas regulations, the market price of R454B has risen by about +18~20% in recent years. minisplitsforless+1 As the US and EU are gradually banning the use of new R410A, the cost of refrigerant for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioners is likely to continue to structurally increase. linkedin+1 R454B maintains a premium of +20~25% per pound compared to R32, so as the proportion of R454B conversion in Gwangju and SEHC air conditioners increases, the refrigerant BOM per unit may increase by approximately +0.2~0.3%p additionally. Action: ① Peak season from July to September for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE Long-term contracts for 6-9 months of R454B/R32 demand (upper limit + 10-15% cap) have been signed. 2) The R454B conversion model will reflect the high-efficiency, low-GWP premium in sales prices and marketing messages to pass on costs. 3) Discussions on R&D to expand the R32/R290 replacement design and reduce refrigerant charge volume in the mid- to long-term are underway (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-31). References: EU Official+1, JohnsonControls+1, HVAC Market Report+1

thisWeek.Title: 알루미늄 변동 확대
thisWeek.Summary: 알루미늄은 최근 LME 현물 기준으로 3,117→2,996달러/톤(2/12→2/13)으로 하루에 -3.9% 급락했고, 이후에도 재고 부담·투자심리 변화로 변동성이 계속 커졌다는 분석이 나왔어요. 단기 가격은 내려왔는데 재고·전력비·탄소비용 변수 때문에 언제든 다시 튈 수 있는 구간이라, SEDAM·SCGE 입장에서는 협력사들이 하락분을 가격에 다 안 넘기고 서차지·프리미엄으로 버티려 할 가능성이 커요. Impact는 2/13 LME 현물 일간 -3.9%를 A(-3.9%)로 보고, 알루미늄 비중이 높은 SEDAM 냉장고·SCGE 열교환기 BOM에는 단기적으론 원가 하락 여지가 있지만, 변동성이 커서 평균 단가 관리가 더 중요해진 상황이에요. 액션: ① 최근 2주 LME 알루미늄 일간 변동률 기준으로 이동평균(예: 10일) 가격에 연동되는 단가 조정 조항을 협력사 계약에 명시 (기한: 2026-02-23) ② SEDAM·SCGE 알루미늄 구매는 Q2까지는 분할 매수 전략 유지하고, 단가 인하 요구 시 ‘LME - 프리미엄’ 분리 네고 (기한: 2026-02-29) ③ EV·전선 수요로 장기 타이트 전망인 만큼 2026년 하반기용 장기계약·헤징 전략 별도 시나리오 수립 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: Westmetall+1, AlCircle+1, BalajiAluminium+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Aluminum recently plummeted -3.9% in a single day from 3,117 to $2,996/ton (2/12 to 2/13) on the LME spot basis, and analysis shows that volatility has continued to increase since then due to inventory burden and changes in investor sentiment. Short-term prices have fallen, but they can rebound at any time due to variables such as inventory, electricity costs, and carbon costs. Therefore, from SEDAM and SCGE’s perspective, it is highly likely that their partners will try to hold on with surcharges and premiums rather than passing on the full amount of the decline to the price. Impact is viewed as A(-3.9%) for the daily -3.9% of the 2/13 LME spot price, and although there is room for a short-term cost decrease in the SEDAM refrigerator and SCGE heat exchanger BOMs with a high proportion of aluminum, the high volatility has made average unit price management more important. Actions: ① Include a unit price adjustment clause in the partner contract based on the moving average (e.g., 10-day) price based on the daily fluctuation rate of LME aluminum over the past two weeks (Deadline: 2026-02-23) ② Maintain the split purchase strategy for SEDAM and SCGE aluminum purchases until Q2, and negotiate a separate ‘LME - premium’ when requesting a unit price reduction (Deadline: 2026-02-29) ③ Establish a separate scenario for a long-term contract/hedging strategy for the second half of 2026, given the long-term tight outlook due to EV and cable demand (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-03-15). References: Westmetall+1, AlCircle+1, BalajiAluminium+1

thisWeek.Title: 냉매 R454B 급등
thisWeek.Summary: 냉매 쪽은 거래소 상장 상품이 아니라 절대 레벨이 중요한데, 최근 미국 기준으로 R32는 lb당 275~300달러, R454B는 345~375달러 수준으로 R32보다 확실히 비싸게 형성돼 있어요. 특히 R454B는 Honeywell의 +42% 추가 할증과 EU F-Gas/쿼터 수수료(1.401유로/kg)까지 겹치면서, 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨 냉매 원가는 사실상 전년 대비 +20% 이상 올라간 상태로 보는 게 안전해요. Impact는 규제·할증에 따른 냉매 비용 구조 변화를 B(+20%)로 두고, ‘R454B 규제비용(약 +20~25%) × 냉매 원가비(에어컨 BOM 내)’ 구조로 추정하면 성수기 전에 추가 부담이 더 커질 수 있어요. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 2026년 성수기(7~9월) 예상 물량을 기반으로 R32/R454B 장기계약 물량·단가 시나리오 2~3안 마련 (기한: 2026-02-28) ② 미국·EU 규제·쿼터 변동 리스크를 반영해 공급사와 서차지 상한(예: +10%) 합의 시도 (기한: 2026-03-10) ③ 차세대 모델에서 R32/R290 전환 가능한 SKU 우선 선정해 개발 로드맵·조달 플랜 연동 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: QualityComfort+1, CoolingPost+1, FacilitiesDive+1, Schiessl+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Refrigerants are not listed on the exchange, but absolute levels are important. Recently, based on US standards, R32 is $275 to $300 per lb, and R454B is $345 to $375, which are clearly more expensive than R32. In particular, with the +42% additional surcharge from Honeywell and the EU F-Gas/quota fee (1.401 euros/kg) for R454B, it is safe to assume that the cost of air conditioner refrigerants for Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE has actually increased by more than +20% year-on-year. Impact is the change in refrigerant cost structure due to regulations and surcharges as B(+20%), and if we estimate it as the ‘R454B regulation cost (approximately +20~25%) × refrigerant cost ratio (within air conditioner BOM)’, the additional burden may increase further before the peak season. Actions: ① Prepare scenarios 2-3 for the volume and unit price of R32/R454B long-term contract based on the expected volume for the peak season (July-September) in 2026 based on Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE (Deadline: 2026-02-28) ② Attempt to agree on a surcharge cap (e.g., +10%) with suppliers, reflecting the risk of fluctuations in US and EU regulations and quotas (Deadline: 2026-03-10) ③ Prioritize selection of SKUs that can be converted to R32/R290 in next-generation models and link them to the development roadmap and procurement plan (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-31). References: QualityComfort+1, CoolingPost+1, FacilitiesDive+1, Schiessl+1

thisWeek.Title: 냉매 R454B 42%↑
thisWeek.Summary: 미국에선 R454B에 이미 +42% 서차지가 붙어 있고, 최근 1~2년 사이 실린더당 700~2,000달러까지 치솟은 사례가 나올 정도로 가격 레벨이 완전히 한 단계 올라가 있어요. Honeywell·Chemours 모두 R454B에 추가 $/lb 인상과 함께 중국산 냉매에 최대 +145% 관세가 얹히면서, A2L 전환 이후에도 공급 부족·고가 구조가 쉽게 안 풀리는 분위기예요. 삼성 관점에서는 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨에서 쓰는 R32/R454B 조달 리스크가 계속 Very High라, 성수기 이전에 최소 4~6개월치 안전재고와 장기계약을 못 잠가두면 Q3 생산 차질과 긴급구매 단가 폭등 가능성이 커요. Impact는 Honeywell 기준 R454B 서차지 +42%를 그대로 반영하면 냉매비 비중이 높은 에어컨 라인 BOM에선 원가 레벨이 의미 있게 올라간 상태로 보는 게 맞아요. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 2026년 하절기 냉매 수요를 보수적으로 상향 추정해 4~6개월치 커버되는 선적 스케줄 확보 ② 미국·중국·동남아 공급선별로 R32/R454B 장기계약 재협상(가격 상한·리드타임·배분조건 명시, 기한: 2026-03-15) ③ 중장기적으로 R32·R290 전환 모델 확대 로드맵을 개발·구매·품질 합동으로 업데이트 (우선순위: 상). 참고: CoolingPost+1, ACHRNews+1, AristotleAir+1, SSIservices+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: In the US, R454B already has a +42% surcharge, and the price level has completely gone up to $700-$2,000 per cylinder in the past 1-2 years. With both Honeywell and Chemours an additional $/lb increase on R454B and tariffs of up to +145% on Chinese refrigerants, the atmosphere is that the supply shortage and high price structure will not be easily resolved even after the A2L transition. From Samsung's perspective, the risk of procurement of R32/R454B used in Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioners continues to be Very High, so if they cannot lock in at least 4-6 months' worth of safety stock and long-term contracts before the peak season, there is a high possibility of production disruptions in Q3 and a surge in emergency purchase prices. If the R454B surcharge +42% based on Honeywell is directly reflected, it is correct to see that the cost level has meaningfully increased in the BOM of the air conditioner line, which has a high proportion of refrigerant costs. Actions: ① Secure a shipment schedule covering 4-6 months by conservatively estimating upward the 2026 summer refrigerant demand based on Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE standards. ② Renegotiate long-term R32/R454B contracts for suppliers from the US, China, and Southeast Asia (specify price caps, lead times, and distribution conditions; deadline: March 15, 2026). ③ Jointly develop, purchase, and quality a roadmap for expanding the R32/R290 conversion model in the mid- to long-term (priority: high). References: CoolingPost+1, ACHRNews+1, AristotleAir+1, SSIservices+1

lastWeek.Title: R32/R454B 규제강화
lastWeek.Summary: 미국·EU에서 저 GWP 냉매 규제로 R32·R454B 수요는 급증 중이지만 R454B는 공급 부족으로 실수요가 17달러→60달러/lb까지 치솟은 사례가 있어요. EU는 2025~26년 HFC/HFO 쿼터를 2023년 대비 -48%로 감축해 저 GWP 전환을 강하게 밀고 있고, Honeywell도 R454B에 +42% 관세 서차지를 부과했어요. 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨용 냉매는 이미 R454B 기준으로 BOM 비중이 크게 늘어난 상황이라, 이 지점에서 R454B 확대 채택 대신 R32·R290 중심 설계로 전환 범위를 넓히는 쪽이 구매팀에선 가장 현실적인 리스크 회피 전략이에요. Impact: R454B 단가 +42% 서차지 × 광주·SEHC·TSE BOM 냉매 비중(2~4%) ≈ 각 제품군 BOM 약 +0.8~1.6% 추가 상승 시나리오; EU 쿼터 -48%로 내년 이후 공급 타이트 기대 → 감가상각·선구매 대비 필요. 삼성 관점: R32는 중국·동남아 다수 공급사가 있어 안정성＋가성비가 좋아, R454B 비중 커진 북미·EU향 설계는 장기적 마진 리스크가 크므로 지속보유·확대가 아니라 축소 대상으로 보는 게 유리. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 냉매 사용량 재산출 후 R32/R454B 시나리오별 BOM 영향 산출 ② R32는 장기계약으로 2~3개 공급사 다원화 확보, 서치지·관세 반영 계약 조건 검토 ③ R454B는 2027년 이전까지 특정 모델만 유지하고 나머지는 R32·R290로 전환하는 로드맵 협의 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-17). 참고: FacilitiesDive+1, Honeywell+1, EU F-gas+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: In the US and EU, demand for R32·R454B is surging due to low-GWP refrigerant regulations, but there is a case where R454B's actual demand has soared from $17/lb to $60/lb due to a supply shortage. The EU is strongly pushing for a low-GWP transition by reducing the HFC/HFO quota by -48% from 2023 to 2025-26, and Honeywell has also imposed a +42% tariff surcharge on R454B. Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE air conditioner refrigerants have already significantly increased their BOM proportion based on R454B. Therefore, the most realistic risk-avoidance strategy for the purchasing team is to shift to a design centered on R32 and R290, rather than expanding R454B adoption. Impact: R454B unit price +42% surcharge × Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE BOM refrigerant proportion (2-4%) ≈ Scenario of an additional increase of approximately +0.8-1.6% in each product group's BOM; EU quota -48%, expected to tighten supply from next year → Need to prepare for depreciation and advance purchases. Samsung's perspective: R32 boasts stability and cost-effectiveness due to multiple suppliers in China and Southeast Asia. Designs targeting North America and the EU, with a higher proportion of R454B, carry significant long-term margin risks, making it more advantageous to consider downsizing rather than retaining or expanding. Actions: ① Calculate the BOM impact of each R32/R454B scenario after recalculating the refrigerant usage at Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE. ② Secure diversification of R32 suppliers to 2-3 through long-term contracts, and review contract terms reflecting search and tariffs. ③ Discuss a roadmap for R454B to maintain only certain models until 2027 and transition the rest to R32/R290. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-17) References: FacilitiesDive+1, Honeywell+1, EU F-gas+1

lastWeek.Title: 인도 2/12 총파업
lastWeek.Summary: 인도에서 2월 12일 전국 단위 총파업이 예고돼 있고, 노조 측은 최대 3억 명까지 참가할 수 있다고 보고 있어요. SIEL-P/SIEL-N이 있는 공업 벨트까지 파업 여파가 번지면, 철강·부품 조달과 물류가 2~3일 이상 흔들리면서 일부 라인은 최대 2~3주 생산 지연 리스크도 열려 있다고 봐야 해요. 대응 방향: 인도 법인은 현지 1·2차 벤더의 가동 계획과 재고 수준을 먼저 점검하고, 최소 3~4주 분량의 핵심 철강·모터·컴프레서 재고를 미리 확보해 두는 쪽으로 움직이는 게 좋아요. 액션: ① SIEL-P/SIEL-N 현지에서 주별 파업 영향 예상 공문·노사 동향 확인 [즉시 확인] ② 인도 조달 철강·부품의 선적 일정·안전재고 재점검 후 부족분 타국(베트남·태국) 전환 시뮬레이션 [비용 계산] ③ 2/12 주간 생산계획(휴무·잔업 포함) 재조정안 수립 및 물류팀과 선적 일정 사전 조율 [대응 준비] (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-11). 참고: 인도현지언론+3
lastWeek.Summary_en: A nationwide general strike is scheduled for February 12 in India, and unions estimate that up to 300 million workers could participate. If the strike spreads to the industrial belt where SIEL-P/SIEL-N is located, the procurement of steel and parts and logistics will be disrupted for more than 2-3 days, leaving some lines at risk of delays of up to 2-3 weeks in production. Response: It would be a good idea for Indian subsidiaries to first check the operation plans and inventory levels of local primary and secondary vendors, and to secure at least 3-4 weeks' worth of core steel, motors, and compressors in advance. Action: ① Check the official notice and labor-management trends regarding the expected weekly strike impact at SIEL-P/SIEL-N [Immediate confirmation] ② Re-examine the shipment schedule and safety stock of steel and parts procured in India, and simulate the transfer of any shortfall to other countries (Vietnam and Thailand) [Calculate costs] ③ Establish a readjustment plan for the production plan for the week of February 12 (including holidays and overtime) and coordinate the shipment schedule with the logistics team in advance [Prepare for response] (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-11). Reference: Indian local media +3

lastWeek.Title: Whirlpool 구조적 비용절감
lastWeek.Summary: Whirlpool이 2023년에만 약 8억 달러 비용을 줄였고, 2024~2026년에도 제조·공급망 쪽에서 연간 1~2억 달러씩 추가 절감을 이어가겠다고 하면서 부품 SKU를 11만 개에서 5만 개 이하로 줄이는 전략을 밀고 있어요.이렇게 구조적으로 마진을 0.8~1.1%p 더 끌어올리겠다는 계획이라, 같은 철강·모터·압축기 벤더를 두고 삼성보다 더 유리한 단가·조건을 선점할 가능성이 커지고 있어요. 우리 기준으로 같은 매출 규모에서 마진 격차 1%p는 연간 수천억 원 차이라 Whirlpool식 플랫폼·모듈 표준화를 벤치마킹하지 않으면 중장기 원가 경쟁에서 밀릴 수 있어요. 액션: ① 세탁기/냉장고/건조기 Top 20 공통 모듈 리스트업 후 SKU 축소 타깃 정의 ② 글로벌 철강·모터·압축기 벤더와 LME/CRU 연동+Gain Sharing 구조 LTA 초안 마련 ③ 북미 공장(미국/멕시코) 자동화 투자 로드맵 초안 수립 및 주요 설비 벤더 다년 계약 검토 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: SupplyChainDive+1, Whirlpool실적/콜요약+2
lastWeek.Summary_en: Whirlpool is pushing a strategy to reduce the number of parts SKUs from 110,000 to less than 50,000, saying that it reduced costs by about $800 million in 2023 alone and will continue to reduce an additional $100 to $200 million annually in manufacturing and supply chain from 2024 to 2026. With this plan to structurally increase margins by 0.8 to 1.1 percentage points, the possibility of securing more favorable unit prices and conditions than Samsung among steel, motor, and compressor vendors is increasing. By our standards, a 1 percentage point margin gap in the same sales volume is worth hundreds of billions of won per year, so if we do not benchmark Whirlpool's platform and module standardization, we may fall behind in the mid- to long-term cost competition. Actions: ① List the top 20 common modules for washing machines, refrigerators, and dryers and define SKU reduction targets. ② Draft an LTA (Long-Term Agreement) with global steel, motor, and compressor vendors, including LME/CRU integration and gain-sharing structure. ③ Draft an automation investment roadmap for North American plants (US/Mexico) and review multi-year contracts with key equipment vendors. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-15) References: SupplyChainDive+1, Whirlpool Performance/Call Summary+2

thisMonth.Title: 미국 한국 관세 재부과 협상 중
thisMonth.Summary: 트럼프 대통령이 한국에 25% 상호관세와 자동차 관세를 재부과하겠다고 밝혔어요. 김정관 산업부 장관이 방미해서 협상했지만 아직 해결이 안 됐대요. 미국이 이미 관보 게재 준비까지 한 상태라고 했어요. 동시에 미국 재무부가 한국을 환율 관찰 대상국으로 재지정했어요 (1월 29일). 삼성 관점: 관세 재부과 시 영향이 클 수 있어요. 특히 생활가전 전자부품(반도체 칩, 모터 등)에 쓰는 중간재 수입가가 올라갈 가능성이 있어요. SEHA 냉장고, 세탁기 같은 대미 수출 제품도 미국 내 원가 상승으로 가격 경쟁력이 약화될 수 있어요. 환율 관찰 대상국 지정은 추후 관세 협상의 지렛대로 쓰일 가능성이 높아요. 액션: ① 트럼프 행정부 관세 발표 일정 모니터링 (매주) ② SEHA 대미 수출 제품별 관세 영향도 시뮬레이션 (기한 2월 10일) ③ 관세 25% 부과 시 원가 상승분 계산 (냉장고·세탁기·에어컨 중심, 기한 2월 14일) ④ 협력사 다원화 및 대체 공급처 검토 (기한 3월 1일) (우선순위: 상, 기한 2월 10일). 참고: 동아일보+1, 미국재무부공시+1, 김정관장관발언+1
thisMonth.Title_en: The U.S. and South Korea are negotiating to reimpose tariffs.
thisMonth.Summary_en: President Trump announced that he would reimpose a 25% reciprocal tariff and automobile tariffs on Korea. Trade Minister Kim Jung-kwan visited the US to negotiate, but no resolution has been reached. The US is reportedly preparing to publish the list in the official gazette. At the same time, the US Treasury Department redesignated Korea as a currency monitoring country (January 29th). Samsung's perspective: The reimposition of tariffs could have significant repercussions. In particular, it could increase the import prices of intermediate goods used in home appliance electronic components (semiconductor chips, motors, etc.). US exports, such as SEHA refrigerators and washing machines, could also see their price competitiveness weakened due to rising US costs. The designation as a currency monitoring country is likely to be used as leverage in future tariff negotiations. Actions: ① Monitor the Trump administration's tariff announcement schedule (weekly). ② Simulate the impact of tariffs on SEHA exports to the US by product (deadline: February 10). ③ Calculate the increased cost of a 25% tariff (focusing on refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners, due February 14). ④ Review supplier diversification and alternative suppliers (deadline: March 1). (Priority: High, due February 10). References: Dong-A Ilbo +1, U.S. Treasury Department announcement +1, Minister Kim Jeong-gwan's remarks +1

thisMonth.Title: R454B 냉매 규제 강화
thisMonth.Summary: EU 냉매 규제 강화 확정됐어요. R454B 공급 부족 심화. Honeywell이 2025년 4월 이미 +42% 서지 실시한 상태. 2026년부터 저GWP 냉매 의무화로 R454B 가격 +20~42% 상승 예상. 광주사업장·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 비용 급증 우려. 삼성 관점: 냉매 공급 계약 긴축 심화 → 장기계약 우선순위 높음. R32 안정성도 점검 필요. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사(Honeywell·Chemours) R454B 확보 전략 수립(기한 2026-02-10) ② 광주·호치민 생산 기지 냉매 공급계약 갱신(R454B +20% 반영) ③ R32 호환 에어컨 모델 개발 협의(기한 2026-03-31) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-10). 참고: EU공식+1, Cooling Post+1
thisMonth.Title_en: Strengthening R454B refrigerant regulations
thisMonth.Summary_en: The EU has confirmed tightening of refrigerant regulations, exacerbating the R454B supply shortage. Honeywell already implemented a +42% surge in April 2025. With the mandatory low-GWP refrigerant requirement starting in 2026, R454B prices are expected to rise by 20-42%. Concerns are growing over the potential surge in refrigerant costs for air conditioners at the Gwangju plant and SEHC. Samsung's perspective: Tightening refrigerant supply contracts → Prioritizing long-term contracts. R32 stability also needs to be reviewed. Actions: ① Develop a strategy to secure R454B from refrigerant suppliers (Honeywell and Chemours) (Deadline: February 10, 2026). ② Renew refrigerant supply contracts for Gwangju and Ho Chi Minh City production sites (refrigerant supply +20% R454B) ③ Discuss the development of R32-compatible air conditioner models (Deadline: March 31, 2026). (Priority: High, Deadline: February 10, 2026). Note: EU Official +1, Cooling Post +1.

thisMonth.Title: 인도 전국 노조 파업 2월 12일
thisMonth.Summary: 인도 RINL 철강노조 + 전국 노조 연합이 2월 12일 대규모 파업을 공식 통보했어요. 임금 인상과 자산 민영화 반대가 핵심 요구사항이에요. SIEL-P(첸나이) SIEL-N(노이다) 공장의 철강 공급사 70%가 인도산에 의존 → 생산 차질 2~3주 우려돼요. 특히 냉장고·세탁기 BOM에서 철강 원가 5~7% 상승 가능. 대응: SIEL-P SIEL-N 현지 담당자와 파업 일정 및 비축 전략 긴급 협의 필수. 베트남·태국 철강사 대체 공급선 긴급 확보 검토. 액션: ① SIEL-P/N 현지 담당자 파업 영향도 확인 ② 철강 협력사별 재고 현황 재검토 및 안전재고 +10% 증가 조치 ③ 베트남(SEHC)·태국(TSE) 철강사 긴급 협상 일정 설정 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-05). 참고: 인도현지언론+2, Reuters+1
thisMonth.Title_en: India's nationwide trade union strike on February 12th
thisMonth.Summary_en: The Indian Steel Workers' Union (RINL) and the National Union of Trade Unions (NUTU) officially announced a large-scale strike on February 12th. Their key demands include wage increases and opposition to asset privatization. 70% of steel suppliers at the SIEL-P (Chennai) and SIEL-N (Noida) plants rely on Indian steel, raising concerns about production disruptions of 2-3 weeks. Steel costs, particularly in refrigerator and washing machine bills of materials, could rise by 5-7%. Response: Urgent consultations with local SIEL-P and SIEL-N representatives regarding strike schedules and stockpiling strategies are essential. Urgent consideration should be given to securing alternative suppliers from Vietnamese and Thai steel companies. Actions: ① Verify the impact of the strike on local SIEL-P and N representatives. ② Review inventory status at each steel partner and increase safety stocks by 10%. ③ Set a date for urgent negotiations with Vietnamese (SEHC) and Thai (TSE) steel companies (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-05). Reference: Indian local media +2, Reuters +1
thisMonth.Tag_en: India, strike, steel, February 12th, SIEL-P, SIEL-N, Labor costs

thisMonth.Title: EU 냉매 규제 강화, R454B 공급 타이트
thisMonth.Summary: EU가 냉매 규제를 강화하면서 R454B 수급이 타이트해졌어요. 한국도 2025년 '오존층 보호법' 개정으로 HFCs 감축 의무가 확대되었어요. 2027년부터 저GWP 물질 우선 전환, 2029년 상용화 냉매는 의무 전환 예정이에요. 냉매 공급사의 가격 인상이 불가피해 보여요. 광주사업장 에어컨 냉매 비용 +18~20% 상승 예상(업계 추정). 냉매쿼터도 2025년부터 감축폭이 크게 확대되면서, 신규 냉매 확보가 어려워질 것 같아요. 삼성 관점: 광주·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 공급사 가격 협상 어려워질 수 있어요 → 장기계약 선제 필요. R454B 대체(R290, R32 호환 모델) 개발 로드맵 가속화 필요. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 R454B 장기계약 재협상(기한 2026-02-14) ② 광주·SEHC 냉매 공급 계약 갱신(선반영 +20% 검토, 기한 2026-02-28) ③ 저GWP 냉매(R290, R32) 호환 에어컨 모델 개발 가속(상품화 기한 2026-Q3) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-14). 참고: 환경부+2, EU공식+1, 콜드체인뉴스+2
thisMonth.Title_en: Tightening EU refrigerant regulations tighten supply of R454B.
thisMonth.Summary_en: As the EU strengthens refrigerant regulations, the supply of R454B has become tight. South Korea's obligation to reduce HFCs has also been expanded with the revision of the Ozone Layer Protection Act in 2025. The transition to low-GWP materials will be prioritized starting in 2027, and mandatory for commercially available refrigerants starting in 2029. Price increases for refrigerant suppliers appear inevitable. The cost of air conditioner refrigerants at the Gwangju plant is expected to rise by 18-20% (industry estimates). With refrigerant quota reductions also expected to significantly expand starting in 2025, securing new refrigerants is expected to become difficult. Samsung's perspective: Price negotiations with Gwangju and SEHC air conditioner refrigerant suppliers could become difficult → Preemptive long-term contracts are necessary. The development roadmap for R454B replacements (R290, R32 compatible models) needs to be accelerated. Actions: ① Renegotiate the long-term R454B refrigerant supplier contract (deadline: February 14, 2026); ② Renew the Gwangju-SEHC refrigerant supply contract (review of pre-refrigeration +20%, due February 28, 2026); ③ Accelerate the development of air conditioner models compatible with low-GWP refrigerants (R290, R32) (commercialization deadline: Q3, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: February 14, 2026). References: Ministry of Environment +2, EU Official +1, Cold Chain News +2

thisMonth.Title: GE Appliances 미국 공급선 확대 1.5억 달러
thisMonth.Summary: GE Appliances(Haier 자회사)가 2025년 11월 미국 공급업체에 1.5억 달러 이상의 신규 계약을 체결했어요. 10개 주 22개 공급사(U.S. Steel 포함)와 세탁기·냉장고 부품 공급 계약을 맺었거든요. 국내 공급업체 지출도 3.3% 증가했어요. 더 큰 그림은 5년 3억 달러 투자로 중국→미국 생산 전환(냉장고, 가스레인지, 온수기)을 가속화하는 거예요. 자동화·로봇화(AMR)로 "Zero Distance" 전략을 추진 중이에요. 삼성 관점: GE의 미국 리쇼어링은 북미 시장 경쟁 강도를 높일 예정이에요 → 납기, 원가 경쟁력 악화 우려. 반면 중국 공급사 의존도 감소 신호이므로, 삼성의 베트남·태국 공급사 비중 확대 기회가 생겨요. 액션: ① GE 미국 공급사 리스트 추적(철강, 플라스틱 업체) ② 삼성 베트남/태국 협력사 생산 용량 확인 ③ 북미 경쟁사 원가 분석 및 삼성 기가팩토리 전략 재검토(기한 2026-03-03) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-21). 참고: AP통신+2, GE Appliances보도자료+1
thisMonth.Title_en: GE Appliances expands its US supply chain for $150 million
thisMonth.Summary_en: GE Appliances (a Haier subsidiary) signed new contracts worth over $150 million with U.S. suppliers in November 2025. The contracts cover washing machine and refrigerator parts with 22 suppliers (including U.S. Steel) across 10 states. Domestic supplier spending also increased by 3.3%. The bigger picture is accelerating the shift from China to the U.S. for production (refrigerators, gas ranges, and water heaters) with a $300 million investment over five years. The company is pursuing a "Zero Distance" strategy through automation and robotization (AMR). From Samsung's perspective, GE's reshoring to the U.S. is expected to intensify competition in the North American market, raising concerns about deteriorating delivery and cost competitiveness. However, this signals a decrease in reliance on Chinese suppliers, creating opportunities for Samsung to increase its presence in Vietnamese and Thai suppliers. Actions: ① Track GE's US supplier list (steel and plastics companies); ② Verify production capacity of Samsung's Vietnam/Thailand partners; ③ Analyze cost estimates of North American competitors and review Samsung's Gigafactory strategy (Due March 3, 2026) (Priority: High; Deadline: February 21, 2026). References: AP+2, GE Appliances press release+1

lastMonth.Title_en: India's nationwide strike on February 12 (final confirmation)
lastMonth.Summary_en: The Central Trade Union (CTU) of India officially finalized a strike date for February 12th at its national meeting on January 9th. The strike targets the steel, electricity, and transportation sectors. The strike is protesting the government's formalization of the enforcement regulations for the four major labor laws (enacted in 2020). The union demands: opposition to the abolition of regular employment, strengthening union registration, and a 15% wage increase. More than 70% of steel suppliers for SIEL-P's Chennai and SIEL-N's Noida plants rely on Indian steel, raising concerns about supply disruptions of 2-3 weeks. At the same time, Indian steel prices are expected to rise by 15%, directly impacting refrigerator, washing machine, and air conditioner production. Response: Real-time monitoring of the strike's scale and schedule with local officials. Consultation with steel suppliers on stockpiling plans is also underway. Urgent security of supply lines in Vietnam and Thailand is also expected. Actions: ① Local SIEL-P/N officials will conduct daily strike status checks (deadline: January 23, 2026). ② Re-examination of stockpiling levels by steel partner companies. ③ Initiation of emergency negotiations with Vietnamese and Thai steel companies. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-01-23) References: Indian trade unions +3, news media +2, international organizations +1

lastMonth.Title_en: USD/KRW trading resumed at 1,480 won
lastMonth.Summary_en: The won-dollar exchange rate opened at 1,480.4 won and then fell to the upper 1,460 won range. It broke the 1,480 won mark for the first time in 17 trading days since the 24th of last month, as President Trump's threat of tariffs on Greenland triggered a risk aversion. President Lee Jae-myung's remarks that the exchange rate would reach "around 1,400 won in two months" prompted a decline in the rate, but it remains high. Samsung's perspective: Continued won weakness → 3.5% increase in the cost of imported raw materials (steel, copper, refrigerant) → worsening price negotiations with suppliers. Actions: ① Monitor daily exchange rate trends (return to the target 1,450 won), ② Reanalyze exchange rate sensitivity by supplier, and ③ Recalculate BOMs for each 1,450/1,480 won exchange rate scenario (Deadline: January 24, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: January 23, 2026). References: Bank of Korea +1, Reuters +2, Chosun Biz +1

lastMonth.Title: Haier 냉매 공급망 리스크 심화
lastMonth.Summary: Haier가 R454B 규제 강화(키갈리 의정서)에 따른 냉매 공급 부족 현황을 공식 성명으로 발표했어요. 중국 정부의 HFCs 생산 할당제(2024년 도입)로 2025년 1월 중국 주요 생산사들이 할당량을 모두 소진했고, 비수기인데도 냉매 가격이 급상승했어요. 2026년도 불소산 시장이 높은 가격 센터 유지될 것으로 예상되고 있어요. 삼성 관점: Haier의 냉매 공급 차질 → 전체 시장 가격 인상 가능성 높음 → 삼성도 소비자 가격 인상 정당성 확보 기회. 하지만 가격 인상 시장 수용성 낮으면 삼성은 원가 절감으로 버텨야 하는 악재 예상. 특히 중국산 냉매 의존도가 높은 한국 시장은 더욱 취약 → R290 대체냉매 전환 속도 가속 필요. 추가로 Haier가 태국 에어컨 공장을 US$400M 규모로 새로 개설했으므로 SE Asia 냉매 수급 경쟁도 심화 예상. 액션: ① 광주·SEHC 냉매 공급사(Honeywell, Chemours, 중국 로컬) 가격 협상 전략 재검토 ② R290·R32 대체냉매 모델 확대 로드맵 수립(기한 2026-03-31) ③ 베트남·태국 냉매 공급사 다변화 검토(기한 2026-02-28) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-24). 참고: 냉동공조저널+1, 중국시장분석+2, Cooling Post+1
lastMonth.Title_en: Haier's refrigerant supply chain risks deepen.
lastMonth.Summary_en: Haier has officially announced a refrigerant supply shortage due to the tightened R454B regulations (Kigali Protocol). Due to the Chinese government's HFC production quota system (implemented in 2024), major Chinese manufacturers exhausted their quotas in January 2025, leading to a sharp rise in refrigerant prices despite the off-season. The hydrofluoric acid market is expected to remain a high-price market in 2026. From Samsung's perspective, Haier's refrigerant supply disruptions are likely to lead to a higher overall market price increase, providing Samsung with an opportunity to justify its consumer price hikes. However, if the market accepts the price increase poorly, Samsung will likely have to rely on cost reductions to sustain its efforts. The Korean market, which is heavily reliant on Chinese refrigerants, is particularly vulnerable, requiring an accelerated transition to R290 alternatives. Furthermore, Haier's opening of a new US$400 million air conditioner plant in Thailand is expected to intensify competition for refrigerant supply in Southeast Asia. Actions: ① Review price negotiation strategies with Gwangju and SEHC refrigerant suppliers (Honeywell, Chemours, and local Chinese suppliers). ② Establish a roadmap to expand alternative refrigerant models for R290 and R32 (by March 31, 2026). ③ Review diversification of refrigerant suppliers in Vietnam and Thailand (by February 28, 2026). (Priority: High, by January 24, 2026). References: Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Journal +1, China Market Analysis +2, Cooling Post +1

lastMonth.Title_en: Indian steel price fixing uncovered
lastMonth.Summary_en: The Competition Commission of India (CCI) has arrested 28 steel companies, including Tata Steel, JSW Steel, and SAIL, and 56 executives for allegedly colluding in steel price fixing between 2015 and 2023. Fines of trillions of won are expected. Concerns are growing over a potential increase in steel import prices at SIEL-P's Chennai and SIEL-N's Noida plants. Steel costs could rise by 15-20% during the production of refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners. Strike risk: The Indian Steel Workers' Union has announced a large-scale strike in February, demanding a 15% wage increase. Supply disruptions are also possible. Response: Currently, we are discussing stockpiling plans with Indian suppliers and are urgently considering securing supply lines in Vietnam and Thailand. Actions: ① Strengthen monitoring of the impact of steel price fixing by the local team at the SIEL-P·N; ② Gather information on strike schedules and check the operational status of each supplier; ③ Set a schedule for emergency contract negotiations with Vietnamese and Thai steel suppliers (Deadline: February 28, 2026) (Priority: High; Deadline: January 25, 2026). References: Competition Commission of India (CCI)+1, Reuters+1, Economic Times+1
